story_txt:
❝I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.❞ – Thomas Edison


Well, one. Sure, we have learned that Indiegogo is not an ideal medium to raise funding for intangible products like websites (though it is great for tangible gadgets and independent films), but we want to say thank you to all our contributors who believed in this page (your contributions have taken us important steps closer), the press who praised us, the firms who put their names behind us, and the people who are supporting us in other ways. 
99.9% of you want to see our site launch, and this campaign has given us invaluable market research, so we're celebrating that! 
We are now looking into more fundraising options, to bring you the world's marketplace to turn your thoughts into things. Thank you again, and please see our closing update here if you'd like more info.
Creatively,
– The Team
Original pitch:

As supported by:
❝A service that we’ve been hoping for practically our entire lives❞

❝Prediction: This Is The Next Big Idea❞
❝Innovations can now be transformed into reality❞


❝An 'Ebay for Ideas'❞


A fraction of the world's most innovative companies we will beam your ideas to at launch†

⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯

Your Big Idea Can Lead to Big Change – For the World and in Your Pocket. Help Us Make that Happen.Do you have an idea of any kind that you've never been able to get out there due to bureaucracy or prejudice, but that know could make a big difference and big money? If you have, or are a company that embraces innovation, we've got an idea...⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯



❝Hell, there are no rules here - we're trying to accomplish something❞ – Edison

Due to funding problems, Charles Babbage died before his invention was completed. That invention was the first computer.
For every one we know about, how many more world-changing ideas die away because there isn't a Babbage Jr. or Mrs Babbage to carry on the fight?
Global innovation is being slowed by an estimated 2300% because of this.
The culprits are prejudice and the Patent system which – founded in 15th century Italy – is an archaic, extortionate roadblock to innovation.
The solution to this problem will come through the computer itself...
With your support "bid-ee-uhs" will be a revolutionary, private auction website to crowdsource & detect the billion dollar "Eureka!" moments of everyday Edisons & Mrs Edisons like you and us, when they're still affordable, and 'blind auction' them confidentially to innovative company buyers in every market - no race or gender roadblocks, and no patent required.And you'll get a lot more than just success in return. Pledge $20 today, get $190 to use at our site. Pledge $35+, get $285! See 'Perks' for more great deals, and pledge now!Usage examples:
You think of a clever company slogan you want to pitch to big ad agencies...
You think of or write an innovative movie idea...
You come up with an amazing toy or game idea...
You write a seriously catchy song...
You invent a baby or mom product that solves a big problem...
You discover a scientific breakthrough or formula...
You create an advanced type of electric car battery...
You have a great idea for a mobile app that could make millions...
...but until now you had no idea where to take it? Let our site turn your thoughts into things!THE SELLER'S PROBLEM: In days of yore when you thought about selling – for example – second hand goods, it meant hoping for the best, using random shop windows and local newspapers, before eBay and Craigslist revolutionized that. Don't you think the laborious way ideas themselves are bought and sold belongs in the past too? $30,000 patents, million-to-one competitions, nerve-wracking TV shows, cold calls, sharks, dragons, unsolicited rejection letters, lawsuits... It's a minefield! Indiegogo is one of the few genuinely fun arenas for innovation out here.So whether you’re an ad-man or soccer mum, writer or composer, architect or father of three, where do all these amazing ideas go? Sadly, often nowhere. You think about them from time to time, try to get them out there, companies refuse to open their door, the ideas just die away, and mother earth loses out. This slows down global innovation. Don't you think that's crazy?THE BUYER'S PROBLEM: And if you were a company, would you rather: 
Use the best idea from your perceptibly "safe" in-house team & colleagues, or;
Play it safe until a great idea makes it big, then buy it, but for millions extra, or;

Safely receive the best new idea that day in the world, whilst it's still great value?

We have that solution. Our unique business model and groundbreaking mechanisms solve both conundrums, and rather than drive prices up like a traditional 'auction,' they predict the genetic fingerprint of future game-changers, thus saving the company money while making you a relative small fortune. See "Our big idea" below for more on all that in a moment.And let's never forget all the women who have world-changing ideas like those of Mary Anderson (windshield wipers) or Stephanie Kwolek (Kevlar), but whose innovations instead died away because they faced gender roadblocks in male-led industries. We want to create one level playing field to turn every human being's thoughts into things, via one friendly interface.And crucially, the whole process will take place whilst protecting both parties equally through a legally watertight confidentiality agreement, and a few trade secret special twists (they're our special sauce). Furthermore, unlike the public offerings on eBay, ours is a private portal where only the top companies we hand pick will be able to view your idea.We'll be working with top L.A. copyright and entertainment law firm, Lowe & Associates.Remember, companies already engage in blind 'auctions' every day – from film script bidding wars to inventors shopping round their ideas for the best deal. We securely tidy that process up for the good of all, without it even seeming like an auction, because companies must innovate better and cheaper to win big, and the key to that is your big idea.

❝Innovative companies .. understand innovation never happens in a vacuum .. are not afraid to break with the norm and push past conventional wisdom that causes people to think in a box.❞

– Rebecca Bagley, Forbes




❝A man may die, nations may rise and fall, but an idea lives on.❞
– JFKJust like crowdfunders get ideas cheap by supporting them early, so can companies. And your mind is amazing! We know that you have that world-changing idea within you, that you'd rather not start your own company to sell. Especially when there's already a perfectly good company out there that could buy it. Nobody needs that much company.

❝...but now, corporate America is reaching out to the independent inventor .. You’ve got successful kid inventors .. grandmothers and everybody in between.❞

– United Inventors Association

❝The patent system is broken❞

– The Verge, Daily Tech, & many more
Transceive ideas privately with buyers in the world's new secure inno-bubble.The patent system is largely unchanged since it began in 15th century Italy. The Internet is amazing. Why haven't the two been effectively linked yet? Recent studies show the average cost of the 5% of infringements that don't settle out of court is actually $1 million per case.Yes, the copyright systems are decrepit and being abused. But out of the flames of the old, imagine what our world will be like if world-class organizations could tap safely into the innovation stream of all the world's ideas through a global 'one-stop-shop'. With your pledge we'll no longer have to imagine. ❝The small-time inventor appears to be making something of a comeback .. A surprising number of those pursuing better mousetraps .. are still garage and bedroom tinkerers.❞

– Mike Brunker, NBC

So this is the private idea crowdsourcing portal being built for the people. That's why we're coming to Indiegogo. We have to raise funds to complete the website, app, and our team, so it can partly be built by the people. Our founders know from experience that having to answer to big bucks investors often leads to a stifled, boxed in product, and we're all about thinking outside the box. We hope you agree.Great companies need great ideas.People with great ideas need great companies.Who are open and innovative enough to listen.Help us disrupt antiquated systems of stuffy rubber stamps and certificates you put in a frame, following practices from the 15th century. It's really starting to show (–Electronic Frontier Foundation). Because when that flood of new stuff appears via our site, it will quickly feel like we're living in the 22nd century.⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯
THE SOLUTION: You could think of this also as a sort of 'online dating' that happily marries innovators to companies. If Cupid can use a helping hand, why can't Genius?The site and app will be a secure, private, bid-and-auction marketplace for you to get that idea in your head, sold, simply and quickly. Keep reading to find out how.❝It's not clear that we really need patents in most industries ... It's a problem.❞– Federal Judge Richard A. Posner (Reuters)

We agree, Judge. Where there’s a problem, there can be a solution. Welcome to our big idea!Companies' fear of being sued if they let you show them your "Eureka!" moment is an outdated, false economy that loses them an innovative edge, and therefore money. And if they're losing money, so are you. So our big idea includes a groundbreaking umbrella of review and detection mechanisms that will clear the long-standing, fossilizing hurdles – and ours are patent pending for what it's worth, so yours don’t have to be. 'It just works.' More on that in a second...Furthermore companies already work with old-school brokers every day, as do innovators with agents. With us as the secure hi-tech broker and agent in one, the need for such early red tape and bureaucracy that officials like Judge Posner criticizes, falls elegantly away. Goodbye old friend.We do this using a special, patent pending (rather ironically) combination of NDAs, defensive publication, tracked company clicks, and trade secret law. Click here for a Wikipedia "Patent" article that discusses just some of that in more depth. We realized that, by trading your idea in our watertight bubble – with only companies who have signed our unique confidentiality contract – we could remove the need for an 'up-front' patent that would protect you from nothing yet choke your purse-strings, and instead let the resourceful company obtain the idea safely first, and the expensive patent second, if at all. And the same goes for other forms of copyright.
Just like digital was the future of photography, we believe crowdsourcing is the future of innovation. We want big companies and your big ideas to be part of that future, rather than a 'Polaroid' of the world that fails to innovate, and like a photo, fades away...⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯
We will finally give your big idea wings, while you're still in your PJs. Here's where the magic happens!:




Upload your big idea!As much or as little of it to the private, secure area of our site. (See FAQ for categories.)


Pick its sector!And pay an all-in-one fee, from just $10 - $95 depending on the sector. (Though we'd love to do it for nothing, we believe the industry expert opinions you'll receive, plus taking days of pitching work off your hands, has value.)


Stay safeBy agreeing to our special and unique Terms & Conditions that - with a few clever and novel twists - protect both parties equally.


Sit back, get fingerprinted & rated!Included in the small fee, our hand-picked panel of Industry Experts in each sector queue then analyze and rate your submission based on a number of factors (some of which stay behind-the-scenes). Our mechanisms then generate a likelihood score (out of 5 stars or 100%) as to whether your idea has the genetic fingerprint of later success on its early seed. Magic! This rating alone gives you invaluable feedback + market research as to your idea's viability.


Sent!We queue then privately send your idea directly to the inboxes of only those company's buyers, in that same category, who fit with receiving that success-star rating of idea or higher. Crucially company buyers only ever receive 1 such email per day, max. (They love this.)


SOLD!Those companies can then exchange as much more info/prototypes with you as needed – if any – and place their one 'best offer' to hopefully secure the rights to your big idea and their next. The 'blind auction' means nobody knows what each company has bid except you. Then just like in real world deals, the best offer wins. Simples.

It's that simple. Speculate to accumulate, #AuctionYourEurekas, then cash out, all without having to pick up the phone. And the companies win big too, with a broader spectrum of 5-star ideas at their e-doorstep, just once a day.

'Microsoft and Google started a bidding war over my software idea, and Apple came in late and won!'

– Possible future user & I.T. Student

This is our big idea. Please PLEDGE and SHARE now, so we can help you sell yours. Because the clock is ticking before someone else comes up with your idea and profits from it instead (we know, we've been there). If you start, others will follow, so show the world what an innovator you are.
❝Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.❞

– Albert EinsteinBut it shouldn't have to be. Help us change that.
  

  

  

  


  

  

 

⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯
The value proposition promotes a rare but genuine win-win-win situation for all parties:Summary of how each party benefits:Companies:
Get access to the next big thing at a cut cost price to them (still a small fortune to the creator)
Retain their innovative competitive edge over their competition
Creatives:
Get to market their brainwave without the expense of antiquated legal protections
Get to cash out on their big idea without the stress of having to start their own company (because the above company is already a company!)

It's also a perfect complement to Indiegogo or other crowdfunding platforms. You could for example use Indiegogo to raise money to build a really great prototype, or even patent your idea (not that you need to with us), or hire a ghostwriter, or get your song professionally recorded, or have your fashion designed... you name it. Then, after your campaign closes, you can move the results onto our site for expert rating and to be opened up to secure bidding.

'They walked with me and my 5-star screenplay every step of the way until I was offered 7-figures by 20th Century Fox'

– Possible future screenwriter

That's why you're here.⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯We did our due diligence in buckets. (Not literally, that would be weird.) Let's harness that energy. It is as unique as your ideas. And we firmly believe it’s the ultimate one-stop-shop home for them. If you're intrigued and would love to use the site... so would we! Simply, I'm excited to bring this portal to the world, because it's a product that I want to use. So please pledge now so our team can build your brain's new summer home (and maybe your real one).❞ – The Team⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯†Mentioned companies are not participants in/sponsors of Indiegogo's fundraising campaign.Interested in joining our Innovation Partners? Just click 'Comments' above and leave us a private message.© Copyright 2014. All rights reserved. Patents ironically pending. Registered Trademarks.⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯

story:
Nobody in the allied army trusts John (besides his co-op partner!) - but John Mambo doesn’t care. He knows his mission and he will put all his effort to neutralise the enemy. The Colonel will send him on various missions, both funny and dangerous. The outcome of those missions depends on you – the player.

The amount of detail contained in each of the missions, the different types of animations, deaths, explosions and traps make John Mambo an experience you will want to play again and again.

As pledgers, not only will you get rewards but you will see John Mambo fully realised as we imagined it!

 

It's always more fun if a pal can help you out. We’ve introduced a cooperative mode so you can play with your friends! A second soldier will be able to accompany you in such difficult tasks but be aware, friendly fire and the decisions you both make will affect the course of the mission... and maybe even your friendship? We all know how much you love high scores!

Do you miss the difficulty of classic retro games? We do and that is why John Mambo is an exacting experience. And if that's not enough, John Mambo has a Nightmare mode where the difficulty level is set to extreme. You will need to bandage your fingers when playing!

 

            

Who is John Mambo? John Mambo is not the kind of guy you want to stumble across while taking a piss in the jungle. He’s a loose cannon and he’s not to be trusted. But he’s also a hero. OUR hero. YOUR hero. The hero the world needs right now.

John Mambo lives for DANGER. Think you’re tough? John Mambo eats bullets for breakfast! You do not want to get in his way, especially when he’s holding a machine gun. Actually, you do not want to get in his way EVER. He’ll take you out, and I don’t mean for dinner. And if he did take you out for dinner, he’d NEVER call you again. He’s got more important things to worry about… like GUNS! And not getting shot by them. Though, if he did, he probably wouldn’t care.

He’s a man on a mission. A mission to blow sh*t up! Sometimes he’ll even save the local villagers, though most of the time he’ll blow them up too because they just slow him down.

 

Our goal is simple, give John Mambo more guns. And grenades. And bombs. But ammo isn’t cheap. That’s why we need your help!

John Mambo likes to work alone, he’s a lone wolf. But it’s dangerous out there for a wolf without his pack. And that’s why we need your pledges! We want to give John Mambo a co-op partner! Because every guy needs his bro!

              

With your help we can bring John Mambo into your life! And who wouldn’t want that? Punch the bad guys. Shoot the bad guys. Blow up the bad guys. Kill the bad guys. DESTROY THEM. DESTROY THEM ALL!

We want to bring you more levels. More detail. More action. And more bullets. But MAINLY more John Mambo.

 

               

John Mambo cares not for financial planning. However, behind every hero there is a base of operations. Yes a lot of the budget goes into ammunition, helicopters and clean-up patrols. If we were to make a pie chart it would be made of meat, pastry and various herbs and spices. But if we were to make a financial budgeting pie chart it would look like this:

 

              

This is a question we hear a lot of villagers cry.

“Why John Mambo?! Why?!”

There’s a simple answer. Because John Mambo is the hero that everybody needs. They just don’t know it yet.

If you want a couch co-op, arcade style, bullet injected action adventure, then look no further. This is it. This is the game for you. The only game. You will never be the same again after John Mambo comes into your life. Help us unleash in to the world. No one can take him down. Not even Chuck Norris. Okay,  maybe Chuck Norris.

When the world sinks into the seemingly endless twilight of boredom, John Mambo will rise like a phoenix from the ashes of his enemies and Blow. Everything. To hell.

         

 

             

We’ve been here since the start. Since the day John was born. We remember it well, he came into the world holding a gun and smoking a cigar. It was beautiful.

We were there when he destroyed the villages, when he blew up the tanks, when he saved the civilians, when he accidentally shot the civilians, and when he blew it all up. We were there. We’ve been there for the highs - defeating the bosses - and the lows… when he lost it all, and died. We were there because without us, and without you, there would be no John Mambo.

 

 

              

f you can’t donate for any reason, just talk about John Mambo to your friends. Share this page. If the world doesn’t already know who John Mambo is, you can change that.

Your help is vital to us, we will always be immensely grateful.

Thank you for your time!

story:
• 2 more small realms (sub levels)

  • 5 new creatures

Hi everyone! Sam here! I would like to introduce you to this campaign of mine.

In the past few years, as a hobby, I have been working on a fantasy game word, creating the rules for the world, its inhabitants and stories of events occurring in it. One of these stories is The Last Student of Magic, a story of how this world ceased to exist, told from the perspective of a young wizard.

I'm a developer and as such I spent most of my free time working on the mechanic for this game, transferring the rules of the imagined world from paper to an actual game world inside Unity game engine.

One great example for this is the Adaptive AI system I have been working on for 3 years. As a smart, challenging and adaptive AI was the core requirement to make a unique world which adapts to the player, offering each and every player the ability to create his/her own story.

Over the past 5 years I managed to finish a great part of the game logic (AI, Spell crafting, casting and advancing system, Realms System, Puzzles, Story/Dialogues, Unique Save and Death System, Loot/Inventory System, ...) with the missing part being the visuals and sounds.

The Last Student of Magic is a immersive fantasy RPG, taking place underground and other small enclosed realms with all sorts of environments and creatures. And because of the scale, the amount of visual assets needed is huge, and not something a small budget game can handle.

Because of that I have split the game in multiple Chapters, with Chapter 1 being the first 5 levels of the game, a subset of creatures and 2-3 small realms (sub levels).

This campaign is meant to secure funds for the needed 3D models and audio assets, so we can release the 1st Chapter and get the initial feedback, exposure and hopefully also additional funds to continue with the next chapters.

Chapter 1 - Planned release is December 2017

 

The Last Student of Magic is a story of a young wizard, an adventure in the underground and the search for the truth of what happen with the world and the loved ones.

Ajimal (M) & Nimla(F)

The game starts with a cut-scene of a story book, read out loud by a old man's voice, introducing the player to the game world with some history.

The book starts with introducing the world called Almez a place inhabited by all sorts of different lifeforms and filled with mystic energy called Acinris.

By mastering that same energy, the human race came out as the dominating species. Mastering this energy was called Magic and the human species discovered two ways of doing so: Some had the ability to absorb the energy around them and store it inside their bodies, and with the use of special Magic circles they would use that energy to do their bidding. The other group has much better control over the energy flow, but couldn't absorb and store any of it in their bodies; however this enhanced control made it possible for them to use and control the energy stored in the crystals called Kupus.

But there would be a rare case where someone would be born with both of these abilities, allowing them to reach an unimaginable level of control over the energy (like Ajimal & Nimla).

In all previous conflicts between the races, only thanks to these masters, the human race would come out victorious. However, in the recent history, there was a war, not amongst species; this time all the species united against a dark force which came out of nowhere and swept across the land devouring everything on its path. As a last effort to stop this enemy, all the species formed a single force to match the darkness. The battle went on for days, weeks and months. In the middle of the battle a huge explosion happened which erased both forces, without a trace left.

Nimla (F)

In that war, many master of magic disappeared, including Rimas (Nimal's uncle), the young but already powerful protege of that time. To this day, two decades later, no one knows what caused the explosion, however the dark force never appeared again.

Now the book closes and shows a old man (Nimal's grandfather) reading it to two children (Ajimal & Nimla at the age of 10). He tells them that they are the new generation of magicians. To achieve that, they should join The Faculty of Magic, where they will learn to master the basics of magic before going out on an Adventure to fully master the control of Acinris.

Fast forward 10 years; the player is showing the entrance of the Central Tower (The main building of the Faculty of Magic, where the final training and exams are held). The two characters are standing in front, discussing how this is their last step in mastering the basics of magic before going on a new adventure together.

The following scene blurs out and the player sees their character breaking out of a spell capsule, in a dark room, disoriented. The last thing the player remembers is standing beside their friend.

Soon the player finds himself in an underground training room of the faculty, noticing that something is wrong. The surroundings look like many years have passed; everything was damaged, covered in moss and dust.

Ajimal Ajibibah(M) & Nimla Cispus(F)


Here starts their new adventure in the underground of uncovering the truth and gaining back their memories piece by piece in the attempt to reach the surface.

On their way back they will come across all sort of creatures (friendly or hostile, this will mostly depend on their actions), magic artifacts, and a lot of challenges blocking their path. There is not one solution, but multiple.

Discover what happens to you, your family and friends, and how you ended up in this situation as you reach back to the surface.

 

The world was inhabitable by all sorts of creatures, coexisting with each other, with small conflicts from time to time, but all in all it was a peaceful place. The dominant species was the human who rose up to the top after mastering the mystic energy of the planet which they named "Magic".

In the recorded history, there was only once a huge war. At that time a dark force swept across the land devouring everything on its path. As a last effort to stop this enemy, all the species united and formed a single force to match the darkness. The battle went on for days, weeks and months. However, in the recent history, there was a war, not amongst species; this time all the species united against a dark force which came out of nowhere and swept across the land devouring everything on its path.

As a last effort to stop this enemy, all the species formed a single force to match the darkness. The battle went on for days, weeks and months. In the middle of the battle a huge explosion happened and erased both forces, without a trace left.


To this day, two decades later, no one knows what caused the explosion, however the dark force never appeared. Hundreds of years passed and the life returned back to normal.

 

You are the main protege of this story. At the very start you get to choose  your main character (boy/girl) which will have some effects on the story.

Your goal is to find your way back to the surface and on the way master the magic and it's elements. You start in a dark room leading to a training room, which is still somewhat functional and will lead you trough the basics of using the controls in the game (an integrated tutorial). You will be taught about new stuff as you come across it the first time.

On your way back to the top you will come across puzzles to solve, you will encounter creatures (friendly or aggressive). In most cases it depends on your previous actions what kind of creatures your will encounter. Don't act hastily; do not attack everything on your way, you will only make it harder for yourself instead of finding allies to help you. Think. As you progress you will recover pieces of your memory, which will help you understand what happened. That will be the key to either your success or death.

 

-Choice

All the choices you make, including the choice of character, will have an impact on the story. Choices you make can alternate the ending.

 

-AI

Most of the creatures are using my self-learning AI and as such they are improving throughout the gameplay. Creatures of the same species are sharing the AI, resulting in the sharing of experience between them. That being said, it is not recommended to stick to just one tactic, it may not work out well in the next encounter.
As the AI improves, your allies will be able to help you more efficiently, and your enemies will use it to crush you to the ground.

 

-Space rings

Small artifacts which have a small space-time realms integrated into them. They are used to store items. The time inside is frozen, so it is also a perfect place to store food for infinite time. They are the perfect inventories to carry stuff around. You will find different rings in the game with different space sizes and limitations to what type of items can be stored inside.

 

-Realm artifacts

These artifacts are created by the most powerful of mages. Just like the space rings, they have a space-time realm sealed inside but with less limitations and a much bigger space. If you have the key integrated into your soul, you can enter and leave such realms freely. But be warned, you never know what you will encounter inside, as the time flow is different from the outside world. Only when someone with the soul key enters, the time flow will stabilize and match the outside world, just to revert back to it's previous state upon your leave. You could find someone you know inside one of them.

 

-Shadow creatures

Most creatures will be found at predefined places, which are best suited for them, unlike the shadow creatures, who are living in the shadows and can appear in any space at any given time. The shadow creatures are controlled by a special AI constantly watching the player from the shadows, and will spawn creatures of different types at different times. This is affected by the play style and some of the choices the player made. The only goal of the shadow is your death, so be prepared and watch your shadow.
*This feature also contributes greatly to a unique experience for each player.

 

-Spells and elements

As you learn new spells and gain control over the power of elements, new paths open. You are free to combine spells and elements to create your unique spells set fitting your playing style. Create great combos using two or more elements to boast the effectiveness of your spells.

 

- Free exploration

The underground is a sealed place, having mostly a linear design. Depending on the players choices, the game can have a few different paths which intersect at different spots. However, all paths end at the same spot.

You are free to go back and forth in the underground, discovering secret places, accessing areas which you weren't able to access with your magic skills at that time. 

Find the Realm artefacts and gain access to new areas with new and unique challenges waiting for you inside. It is also a beautiful place to take a break, refill your energy and work on your spells.

 

FLASH BACKERS - FIRST 20 BACKERS which support the project by getting a perk of $20+

Besides being featured on the TLSoM web site, Flash Backers will receive a SPECIAL THANK YOU GIFT and +1 upgrade to a higher perk.

The first five who back the project with $40+ will gain an additional +1 perk upgrade.

 

Even without contributing money to this project, you can help by sharing this with friends, spread it across the internet and also reach out to me with constructive feedback.

And a BIG THANK YOU for any kind of support ;)

You could find someone you know inside one of them.
 
-Shadow creatures
Most creatures will be found at predefined places, which are best suited for them, unlike the shadow creatures, who are living in the shadows and can appear in any space at any given time. The shadow creatures are controlled by a special AI constantly watching the player from the shadows, and will spawn creatures of different types at different times. This is affected by the play style and some of the choices the player made. The only goal of the shadow is your death, so be prepared and watch your shadow.*This feature also contributes greatly to a unique experience for each player.
 
-Spells and elements
As you learn new spells and gain control over the power of elements, new paths open. You are free to combine spells and elements to create your unique spells set fitting your playing style. Create great combos using two or more elements to boast the effectiveness of your spells.
 
- Free exploration
The underground is a sealed place, having mostly a linear design. Depending on the players choices, the game can have a few different paths which intersect at different spots. However, all paths end at the same spot.
You are free to go back and forth in the underground, discovering secret places, accessing areas which you weren't able to access with your magic skills at that time. 
Find the Realm artefacts and gain access to new areas with new and unique challenges waiting for you inside. It is also a beautiful place to take a break, refill your energy and work on your spells.

 

FLASH BACKERS - FIRST 20 BACKERS which support the project by getting a perk of $20+
Besides being featured on the TLSoM web site, Flash Backers will receive a SPECIAL THANK YOU GIFT and +1 upgrade to a higher perk.
The first five who back the project with $40+ will gain an additional +1 perk upgrade.
 


Even without contributing money to this project, you can help by sharing this with friends, spread it across the internet and also reach out to me with constructive feedback. 
And a BIG THANK YOU for any kind of support ;)

story:
Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD is a not-so-serious adventure that brings together mechanics from Action RPG and RTS games. You’ll control Kofi, a weak, lazy and unlucky videogame character that will be followed by a group of interesting (and pathetic) characters aiding him to live a great adventure.

The videogame introduces a world of comic fantasy in which the characters are aware of being part of a videogame. Kofi is an RPG character that spends his days lazing around without leveling up. His game is a total mess and every character around him plays better.

Features

  • RTS troop control. Real-time group management. Control your own army.
  • Captains with special skills.
  • Find or buy weapons and equipment that allows you to improve your characters; multiple enemies with different qualities: find the best strategy to win.
  • An adventure full of humor and exciting all the same that talks about a beginner adventurer’s road to self-improvement, and the importance of teamwork. With loads of surreal situations and unforgettable characters.
  • Explore a big map with different environments (forests, houses, caves, mountains, water areas…). Find chests with unique weapons, funny side quests or simply discover new details about Kofi's world through characters’ stories or written texts.
  • More than 60 different enemies.
  • Interaction with characters or elements of the stage. Many of the elements of the stage can be selected or destroyed (bushes, rocks…).
  • Fully functional game console. You can get some retro games to play if you can find them at sidequests.
  • Thousands of voiced lines for each language (English and Spanish).

Gameplay

In this adventure, Kofi will recieve a war horn. If you sound the horn, your soldiers will know it's time to show up. 

Defeating enemies will give you motivation points (the more points you gather, the more allies you can call). Each combat unit has a motivation cost based on their value in battle. Motivation is the main theme in this game: you need motivation to psyche up your buddies and reach great goals together.

 

Campaign and exploring

Your camp ("the Shelter") will be your gathering point. It’s where all the characters you recruit for your army will wait for you. You can talk to them and get them ready for a quest. 

Every time you want to resume the main campaign, you can go to a new quest and thus continue the game story.

When you finish a new segment of the campaign, you can choose between continuing right away or freely exploring the map you’ve unlocked thus far in search of gold, treasures or side quests.

Your army

Enemies

In the game you’ll find over 60 different enemies. Before taking on one, it’s important that you assess the way it acts as well as its type of damage and defense. The objective is to offer a wide variety so that the player will always be on guard and learning something new every time they reach new regions.

As you discover new enemies, they will all be recorded in a notebook and you’ll be able to check a file with additional information.

Equipment and items

The game contains some RPG concepts in order to custom and improve your army. Weapons, armor and stupid and funny newbie items will affect your characters’ stats. You can see your characters equipment all time, during gameplay and at cutscenes. There are many weapons and objects scattered around the game. Find them all will be a challenge only suitable for great explorers.

Retro console

There's a fully functional game console in Kofi's house. You can get some retro games to play if you can find them at sidequests.

Awards

References

When creating Kofi's world, the biggest influences were the universes of Zelda and Warcraft, and some of these influences are quite represented in Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD gameplay and art. There is also a strong influence from Monkey Island saga, Kingdom Rush saga,  Munchkin card game, Adventure Time or Undertale.

Platforms

We're working on both the PC version and, for the next year, the Nintendo Switch port. With more support maybe we can bring the game to more console platforms or computer systems.

Languages

We have worked really hard to put voice to the game in both English and Spanish. We would like to translate the game to more languages (text only), but the script is extensive and we would require a lot of support to be able to do it. If we get enough support, our priorities would be German, Russian and Chinese, although in the future would like to go for even more languages, such as French or Japanese. 

Please, contact us telling us what language you would like to see Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD in in the future!

Story

Kofi is a character from an RPG game. He spends his days lazing around and hasn’t even made it past level 10. Kofi goes to his instructor to ask for help improving and gets gifted with a summoning skill as an attempt to motivate him to keep pressing forward in the game. Kofi’s summon’s name is Lime, a slime that happens to have zero motivation and be even lazier than him, and that would rather nest himself in the couch in a valiant attempt at doing nothing together than help him progress.

Your game starts in the region of Neighborwood. That’s where Kofi lives. Neighborwood is an ideal region for beginner mercebinaries, although it has birthed some powerful ones, too. It’s full of forests and mountains.

Kofi doesn’t tend to leave Neighborwood because he never has a big quest to attend to. Maybe Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD will be a great chance to live a big adventure and discover new regions...

While Kofi and the kids from Startville are enjoying their quiet and boring lives, they happen upon a mysterious guy dressed in red claiming to have lost a bottle. The kids of the Shelter and Kofi undertake this quest thinking it will be easy, but things will not quite go as expected... 

Voice acting

It’s important to take a minute in this point, since it’s a part of the game in which we’re investing a great deal of effort. A team of more than 10 actors and actresses voice dozens of characters. We’ve paid careful attention to each of the voiced lines, which are in the thousands.

We have worked with a team of actors and everything has been recorded in a professional studio, paying close attention to the editing of each audio track.

It should be noted that in Kofi’s world not all characters have the privilege of having been given a voice. It’s a recurring gag. Not all characters are voiced (some NPC don't), but all that are will speak in all of their scenes, no matter how unimportant they may be. 

 

Campaign Items

More about Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD

Factions

Humans. Many mercebinaries are humans, but careful! Not all of them. Human mercebinaries tend to be independent, very self-centered, searching for gold, new weapons or leveling up. They’re always willing to live great adventures to tell them in the tavern at the end of the day. 

Elves. Elves tend to be perfectionists and word is, they generally handle their game properly. Usually, they know how to get gold and are more polite and well-behaved than humans.

 

Orcs. Most orcs gather in tribes and tend to work as enemy characters, but a number of them live quite normally among other factions, such as humans or elves, and word is that they are generally good at managing their own businesses. 

Scales. The scales live in aquatic regions (and being the good aquatic creatures that they are, they fail to die when falling in water). Their warriors are strong and fast swimmers, although their NPC live quiet lives and don’t strengthen their muscles because they don’t tend to move around all that much. Or at all. 

There are more factions in Kofi’s world and in Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD, we’ve only shown some of them.

Characters

One of the most interesting aspects of Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD is the amount of characters you will find. Here we show you some of them.

Kofi (the noob). Not the strongest warrior around, but… but nothing, really. His sword is half broken, and if worse comes to worst you can throw stones at your enemy or run away (spoiler alert: not the fastest guy around, either).

Lime (the slime). He’s Kofi’s first summon. Instead of going out to fight, he’d rather spend the day eating snacks and playing video games. He’s rude, untrusting, lazy, slow and always willing to bring morale down whenever someone wants to do something, but at least his body is explosive and can deal great damage to his enemies (and to his friends).

Wargo (the dire wolf). He’s Kofi’s second summon. He’s fast, strong and has incredible ice powers…which is why he doesn’t yet follow Kofi’s commands as much as he’d like.

Instructor (the instructor). He’s in charge of managing the quests of all the mercebinaries assigned to him (and there are quite a few of them). He’s always scolding Kofi for his apathetic attitude. All of his free time goes towards online games and parties.

Gratt and Rodt (two strong mercebinaries). They’re two powerful, inseparable mercebinaries. Kofi looks up to them as an unreachable goal, especially when they meet in the tavern and Rodt and Gratt sit around talking about their most recent epic adventure.

Elfa (the friend). She’s Kofi’s best friend. Unlike him, Elfa handles her game properly and progresses lots. Maybe she’s too proper. She’s not quick to break rules, but will show her impish side if there’s money involved.

The guy in red. This mysterious young boy will suddenly appear in the lives of Kofi and his friends searching for a missing bottle.

 

Art

We’ve attempted to create a unique style of cartoon with Japanese influences. The graphic style is inspired by the concept art of Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker. We’ve designed a visual style that seamlessly fits in both the webseries and the video game to create a transmedia experience that’s as coherent as possible. 

The characters have lots of facial and corporal expressions to create cinematic sequences full of life. Kofi has more than 300 different animations.

We want the player to feel like he’s inside an interactive cartoon film, which is why we’re treating those cinematic sequences with infinite care.

Music

 

Mariano Ruiz is in charge of Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD’s soundtrack, with occasional collaborations with Javier Ignacio Córdoba and the Spanish punk rock band nO Regrets. Mariano Ruiz has been working with a number of music projects for years, and to get Kofi’s own music identity, he’s based it on soundtracks from sagas like Zelda, Final Fantasy, Skyrim or many other RPG from the 16-bit era, which has resulted in an interesting mix of musical concepts with a retro style that will perfectly accompany the moments of humor and action. 

 

Webseries

The Kofi project was born as an animated Webseries. In the timeline of the Kofi universe, the animated series takes place right before Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD, but both products are scripted so they can also be enjoyed independently. You don’t need to have watched the show to understand the game, nor the other way around! The Webseries can be watched for free on Youtube and Newgrounds and we have new more English episodes incoming.

(First Kofi animations published first time in 2014)

 

About Loftur Studio

The studio began thanks to the spread of a parody comic, but mostly thanks to the Spanish manga 5 elementos (5 Elements), a story with 16 published books, over 40,000 sales and several awards over a 9 year period. Having worked on a long project like 5 elementos has been a fundamental exercise to be able to to create a universe so full of moments and characters, which is exactly what the universe of Kofi is.

In the past, we also informally worked on the free-to-play fighting video game Mano-chan fighters, a project that gave us the push to take on the webseries Kofi and, later on, the video game Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD. 

 

Kofi Quest: Alpha MOD dev Team

  • Jesús García - Artist, Writer and Game Designer
  • Ernesto Pacheco - Animation & Cinematic programmer
  • Angel Rubio - Programmer
  • Jaume Vera - Programmer
  • Marcos Herranz - Technical artist & Programmer

We’re also lucky to have great collaborators such as Mariano Ruiz, Javier Ignacio Córdoba and nO Regrets (music), Juan Daniel García (background concept art), Xevi Arbat (PR support), David Flores (sound support) and Dari García (English translation). 

 

Follow us!

 

More about this campaign

We have worked on this project on our own for several years, but our resources are very limited and we really need help from players to turn Kofi Quest into the game we’ve dreamt about. We received plenty of support from our backers through our recent Kickstarter campaign, but we want to keep offering the possibility of participating in the project to all of those who didn't discover the first campaign of Kofi Quest in time.

We’d also like to be able to translate the game to more languages or work on other console versions and keep reaching new users who can give us their support and opinions about the work we're doing.

Thanks to the webseries and to our participation on video game fairs, we know that there are many people interested in learning much more about Kofi and his universe, and with everyone’s help we can reach loftier goals and expand the universe through this game or other future projects.

Although we work with great care, Loftur Studio is a very small studio. We have experience in story development, comics, animation, voice acting… But developing this video game is quite a challenge in many different ways, and even though we learn from this experience every day, we need resources to be able to work more and better.

story:
UPDATE: PROJECT FUNDED thanks to local support. IT'S HAPPENING! Website is coming soon and series 2 is on its way. Bookmark laserpunktoys.com and like the facebook page to get updates.

Do you miss the long-defunct M.A.S.K. toyline from the 80's like I do? Well, I've got something for you...

 


 

P.U.N.K.S. is a retro M.A.S.K. style series of 3 inches articulated action figures with accessories, the first series in the 1:24 scale Laser Punk toyline!




About me and the toys you've been waiting for since 1989...


You can call me Blackcherry Special, I'm a mysterious french guy creating weird stuff.

When I'm not setting up secret plans to conquer the world, I'm playing Monster High and TMNT with my kids and our 7 years old neighbor. That's right, I've never stopped collecting and playing with toys because the inner 80's kid inside of me never left... and I'm quite happy with that!

My favorite toyline was (and still is) M.A.S.K. by Kenner, and when i take a look at my collection, something seems to be missing: Freshness. This wonderful toyline stopped in 1989 and this let me sad and empty (add violins here). As i get older and older  the idea of creating M.A.S.K. style action figures get bigger and bigger.

That led me to start the Laser Punk toyline... and here's the first series: P.U.N.K.S.! A bunch of cool semi-parodic figures, compatible with Kenner's M.A.S.K., part faithful to the classic toyline and part homage to the crazy characters from 80's films like "Mad Max 2", "Class of Nuke'em high", "Bronx Warriors" and "Escape from New York".

 


 


(note that there won't be no "figure stand" with the actual action figures you'll get)
 


Why this campaign?

I need your help to bring Laser Punk to the next level of awesomeness!

Through this campaign, I'm raising funds to produce, promote and expand the Laser Punk toyline by offering the first one (P.U.N.K.S.) in an limited "first shot" colorway which will NOT be done ANYMORE!

I don't need much money but i need some: 1000€, this is how i miss to take Laser Punk to the next level!  DONE!

This money will be used for promoting the P.U.N.K.S. series, producing custom blisters and eye-popping art for the packaging of the next Laser Punk series and a Laser Punk website. Trust me, you'll be SHOCKED and AMAZED to see what Laser Punk is coming up with!

Note that Laser Punk toys aren't average industrially mass produced toys, they're made with love in limited runs, handcasted and handpainted the good old way. PRO quality fan made toys!


 


 

 


"What do i get if i make a pledge...?"

 T-O-Y-S!!


P.U.N.K.S. means "Powerful Useful Nasty Kommando Scums" (what would be a tribute to M.A.S.K. if not named with an acronym?). Like every Laser Punk figures to come, they're 3 inches tall / 1:24 (yep, that's the classic M.A.S.K. scale!) action figures with mask (let's call them "Power Helmets"), weapon and have 5 points of articulation.

The P.U.N.K.S. action figures are real, they're not abstract concepts or lines on a blueprint: 99 P.U.N.K.S. have been already produced and i'm offering them through this campaign as rewards for your help!



 

So, as I wrote, there's 3 different P.U.N.K.S. characters nicknamed after their haircuts Mohawk, Celtic and London.

So this is what you can get today: articulated action figures from the P.U.N.K.S. series, the very first series in the Laser Punk toyline, hand painted with style in a limited to 99 (that's only 33 of each!) colorway.

 


   

But wait, there's more...


  

Comics!

 

Toys are way more interesting when they have a backstory, don't you think?
 Well, I don't have the power to bring you a saturday morning cartoon but i could do you a comic. Actually... I'm doing it right now. As you read this text, I'm finishing and lettering a 12 pages comic that will tell you both the origins and the future of the P.U.N.K.S. characters! This comic is going to be put online during the campaign so you can read it for free (more details coming soon).

 

 


 

 

 


SPREAD THE WORD!!!

 

Throw a message on your Facebook, talk about it on forums, tell a friend, tell a foe, just talk about it and give links to this page that will help A LOT! I'll be a happy man if you just post this link http://laserpunktoys.com

I really need to reach as many people as possible to continue and bring more figures!

 

Thank you very much!
story_txt:
UPDATE: PROJECT FUNDED thanks to local support. IT'S HAPPENING! Website is coming soon and series 2 is on its way. Bookmark laserpunktoys.com and like the facebook page to get updates.





Do you miss the long-defunct M.A.S.K. toyline from the 80's like I do? Well, I've got something for you...

 

 P.U.N.K.S. is a retro M.A.S.K. style series of 3 inches articulated action figures with accessories, the first series in the 1:24 scale Laser Punk toyline!





About me and the toys you've been waiting for since 1989...

You can call me Blackcherry Special, I'm a mysterious french guy creating weird stuff.
When I'm not setting up secret plans to conquer the world, I'm playing Monster High and TMNT with my kids and our 7 years old neighbor. That's right, I've never stopped collecting and playing with toys because the inner 80's kid inside of me never left... and I'm quite happy with that!
My favorite toyline was (and still is) M.A.S.K. by Kenner, and when i take a look at my collection, something seems to be missing: Freshness. This wonderful toyline stopped in 1989 and this let me sad and empty (add violins here). As i get older and older  the idea of creating M.A.S.K. style action figures get bigger and bigger.
That led me to start the Laser Punk toyline... and here's the first series: P.U.N.K.S.! A bunch of cool semi-parodic figures, compatible with Kenner's M.A.S.K., part faithful to the classic toyline and part homage to the crazy characters from 80's films like "Mad Max 2", "Class of Nuke'em high", "Bronx Warriors" and "Escape from New York".
 

 


(note that there won't be no "figure stand" with the actual action figures you'll get)  
Why this campaign?

I need your help to bring Laser Punk to the next level of awesomeness!
Through this campaign, I'm raising funds to produce, promote and expand the Laser Punk toyline by offering the first one (P.U.N.K.S.) in an limited "first shot" colorway which will NOT be done ANYMORE!
I don't need much money but i need some: 1000€, this is how i miss to take Laser Punk to the next level!  DONE!
This money will be used for promoting the P.U.N.K.S. series, producing custom blisters and eye-popping art for the packaging of the next Laser Punk series and a Laser Punk website. Trust me, you'll be SHOCKED and AMAZED to see what Laser Punk is coming up with!
Note that Laser Punk toys aren't average industrially mass produced toys, they're made with love in limited runs, handcasted and handpainted the good old way. PRO quality fan made toys!

 

 
 
"What do i get if i make a pledge...?"
 T-O-Y-S!!
P.U.N.K.S. means "Powerful Useful Nasty Kommando Scums" (what would be a tribute to M.A.S.K. if not named with an acronym?). Like every Laser Punk figures to come, they're 3 inches tall / 1:24 (yep, that's the classic M.A.S.K. scale!) action figures with mask (let's call them "Power Helmets"), weapon and have 5 points of articulation.
The P.U.N.K.S. action figures are real, they're not abstract concepts or lines on a blueprint: 99 P.U.N.K.S. have been already produced and i'm offering them through this campaign as rewards for your help!


 
So, as I wrote, there's 3 different P.U.N.K.S. characters nicknamed after their haircuts Mohawk, Celtic and London.
So this is what you can get today: articulated action figures from the P.U.N.K.S. series, the very first series in the Laser Punk toyline, hand painted with style in a limited to 99 (that's only 33 of each!) colorway. 
 

   
But wait, there's more...

   Comics!
 
Toys are way more interesting when they have a backstory, don't you think? Well, I don't have the power to bring you a saturday morning cartoon but i could do you a comic. Actually... I'm doing it right now. As you read this text, I'm finishing and lettering a 12 pages comic that will tell you both the origins and the future of the P.U.N.K.S. characters! This comic is going to be put online during the campaign so you can read it for free (more details coming soon).
 
 

 

 
 SPREAD THE WORD!!!
 
Throw a message on your Facebook, talk about it on forums, tell a friend, tell a foe, just talk about it and give links to this page that will help A LOT! I'll be a happy man if you just post this link http://laserpunktoys.com
I really need to reach as many people as possible to continue and bring more figures!
 
Thank you very much!

story:
My Name is Daniel and my wife, Tabitha has ALS. This is our story.

 A few years ago because of a occupational change from a coal miner, (thanks to jobs becoming scarce in the coal industry), to a CNA. I have taken a drastic pay cut and Tabitha had to go back to work.

This past December she started stumbling on the treadmill during her workout. By January she was using a cane. By March she could not work her job as a unit secretary at our hospital because she was having difficulty holding on to a pens, not to mention her stumbling was becoming more of an issue. Then in May she was on a walker with a brace.  The doctors she was seeing were having a difficult time figuring out what exactly was going on, we just knew her condition was getting worse. She was referred to University of Kentucky ALS Research clinic and was diagnosed in July.

As a Certified Nursing Assistant I don't make a lot of money and we are still in the process of jumping through hoops with Social Security for her disability check, so I am the sole income that this household gets. In the time from I lost my job as a miner until now, we have lost our home and are now living in a home provided by her most generous aunt and uncle.

    My wife deserves better than what I have been able to provide her and our son. She has been my rock, and she is a wonderful wife and mother.  So I'm calling out to my friends and the gaming community to make her small wish a reality

    One of her her biggest wishes is to go back to PAX East with our son.

    PAX has been hailed as a celebration of gamer culture. Defining characteristics of the festival include an opening speech from gaming industry leaders, concerts, panels on gaming topics, exhibitor booths , LAN parties, tabletop game tournaments, and video game free to play areas. In other words everything that our family loves to do together....

    Back in 2013 Tabitha and I attended PAX East and had a great time however we felt Zane was just a little too young to take with us. Zane has asked when we all will be going together since then. Leave it to our son to be more excited about a gaming convention than Walt Disney World... Tabitha wants to make sure we share this experience together.

    To make her wish a reality we need:
    • 3) 3 Day Passes for the event. (About $75 each pass).
    • A hotel room for the three of us for 4 nights at hotel that would be the most accessible to her in a wheelchair.  (Approx. $1250)
    • Round trip plane tickets (Approx. $1450)
    • Any extra funds we recieve will go towards food for the three of us and souvenirs for our son.

    The Impact

    Making this small dream a reality would make memories for the rest of her life as well as our son's life...I cannot express in words what this would mean to me.... she is my everything.

    Risks & Challenges

    The risks are not being able to get the 3 day passes for the event when they go on sale because these passes go quick. But if I have to I'll buy a pass for each individual day if necessary. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please share this with your friends so this has the biggest chance of happening. Thank you for your time and your contribution.

story:
Not a Developer? Love Drones? Here’s What You Get

  As Featured On



  Why Pledge Now?


Our mission is to create a valuable open-source ecosystem, not just a product, to harness the power of a strong developer community for the future of drone innovation.

Building community - Help us bring Percepto out of the lab
The more demand for Percepto now, the cheaper we can manufacture them
Be one of the 1st Percepto owners
Save significantly during the campaign and after (with enough backers we can lower the market price).


  What's In The Box?  

Percepto is a tiny black box ​that consists of a Tegra K1 based processing unit and a camera which easily connects to almost any drone, enabling users to create, upload and use existing apps from one centralized place, known as the Percepto Marketplace.


Included Software

Percepto App Marketplace 

Percepto App Marketplace is meant to be the 1st marketplace designated for drone apps. Percepto's open source platform allows drone owners to reuse and share software driving down the cost of of developing new drone capabilities.



   What's Unique?


    Plug N Play Percepto



 Rewards

 

  Compatibility




 Technical Specifications



   Production Timeline


  Sketches


 

  Founding of Percepto

Team Percepto ​was founded after a ski trip to the Alps, when Dor Abuhasira, an electrical engineer at ECI and getting a Masters in Computer Vision, and his best friend Raviv Raz, who previously worked at one of the world's largest drone manufacturers, understood that their ski drone + GoPro footage would be of much higher quality if the drone could navigate and film autonomously. So they quickly brought on Sagi Blonder, also working on his Masters in Computer Vision, to complete the core team and build “brains” and “sight” for drones.

  The Team



Risk And Challenges

We've prepared at length for post-campaign manufacturing and delivery costs and set timelines, though it's always a startup's challenge to take a new hardware product to scale. 

We  aim for complete accuracy when combining mass manufacturing and our core technology.

We promise to be transparent throughout the process and preemptively want to let you know that there could be bumps along the way especially with assembly time and availability which could affect our delivery timeline. 

When we ship, we will take into account that our shipping partners take great care in getting you your Percepto out of the box perfect condition. 

Thank you for taking flight with us on this campaign. 



FAQ

Which drones will Percepto connect with?
We’ve already tested Percepto with 3DR Pixhawk and DJI Naza controllers, so, every drone that uses one of these controllers is compatible, but basically, you can connect it to every drone that has a PPM input in its flight controller. Also, the drone can’t be too small, as it has to carry Percepto, which will weigh around 5 ounces (140 grams).


What apps will Percepto come with?
Enrich, and The director apps


Does Percepto include a flight controller?
No


How hard is it to install?
Very simple, easy as any other add-on


Is it crash proof?
Percepto is very durable, if your drone survives the crash – so will Percepto


How do I know you will deliver?
Our product is ready for the market. We cannot over emphasize just how important this community is to us, we would not launch if we weren't confident of our success


When will you start shipping?
October 2015


I live in a foreign country, will you ship to my address?
Yes


Will it work with Android or IOS devices?
Percepto will support both


I’m a blogger or journalist, and want to write more about you’re doing. Who can I talk to?
Dor@percepto.co


I’m interested in buying Percepto for retail distribution, who can I talk to? 
Dor@percepto.co


Have more questions?
No problem! Give us a shout at Dor@percepto.co or in the comments section

story:
What is CUBICUS?

Cubicus is a brand for young children based on five texturized cubes that represent a child's daily activities. We produce digital interactive experiences for parents and kids, focusing on both learning and having fun. The main focus of the project is on having fun while reinforcing the child's daily routine. To date, Cubicus has developed a series of digital products that include animation (product gamification and the presentation of characters); a free video application; a space on tumblr with a summary of the educative tips that have been developed up to now.

     WE ARE CREATING an IOS App for mobile and tablet devices  that include both animation and interaction activities with kids. We have also developed a part of the videogame that is a menu for parents for helping them in possitive routine reinceforcement. The product is based on touch games for kids and platforms for parents, presenting it as a experience that can share and experience with kids.

    Know more about us in our  Cubic website or social media platforms.

                                                                    

               Twitter         Facebook          Google +        Youtube 


The Characters

Do you want to know more about our cubes and the video-game attached to each one? Click their name button and you will discover more !

  

             Bubbles                                               Hule                                             Otto

                                          

                                   
     

                                                     Verdi                                     Mimir

TimeLine

One Of the main objectives of this Crowdfunding campaign is inviting our community to make something very special happen, taking part as beta testers of the videogame and this wonderfull cubic experience. We want to share it in a organsied , taking timing as a serious part of the crowdfunding process .

We have alredy developed a 40 % of the game –including gamedesign, art developing, animations, 10 platform game design and mechanics  and more than 10 touch games plus creating a team.

The Aim is to work in a production package that we will split into 5 different apps, all coherently divide into different cubes and activities. We are inviting to the crowdfunders through perks to take part on the early product feedback .

The production planning is divided into 3 main stages : until june, the aim is to focus into the art and game design, for ending the current process and starting with programming idle and general development issues . There are two main production packages –from May to August 2015- and from September to middle December 2015 – for both art and programming. The aim is to divide the work into 1, 2 and 2 cubes work.

The official launch is programmed for February after 2 months work for fixing , server uploading and programming.

Funds




We need the money for music design, programming and English version adaptation of the game.  The Crowdfunding USD$ Goal is  35000 dollars.

The art development includes both ending art and gamedesign, focusing on improving the developments that have been carried out. The programming is based on a 3-4 people team – interships, junior programmer and 1 supervisor- that works  together with the art team.

The taxes part is divided into two different categories : the tax for the product has 21 % retention but other rewards can be set as donations and have a 13,68 % retention fees. If we add expenses of personel , it is a 25 % approximated of the current budget.

Rewards


Other ways you can help

Becoming a CUBICUS programmer. We are searching for young talented programmers and we are offering internships as a way to collaborate with us. Unity 3D knowledge is important for developing this task as is the ability to work as part of a team.
.Share it! Spread the word . Join us on Twitter, Facebook or Youtube

The Beta

Since January, we have been setting up features for the game, producing a pre-beta of CUBICUS, testing animations, idles and the mechanics .

You can play the beta in our website

story:
I'm here to try to raise enough money to put me through training until the 2016 Olympic Games in Rio. I need $6500 USD to support me for one year of training located in Phoenix, AZ. I have already been invited to attend the elite camp at the World Athletics Center in Arizona, pending my graduation from Cal in December.
I'm indoor and outdoor high hurdle All-American for the Golden Bears.
I would be more than happy to send you updates on my progress or anything else you would like to know from now until the Games start and after. I need 0.03 of a second to qualify for Rio to represent my home country of Serbia, and this camp would be an incredible opportunity for me.

I was in a contact with a management company,  and that was supposed to be my potential connection with potential sponsors. Unfortunately, we are no longer in contact and I am not able to wait and see if something will happen if I want to have a chance at this opportunity.  This way, not being represented, it's very hard to find any sponsors. That's the main reason why I need your help.

$6500 is a decent amount of money, but it will all go to the training expenses required by the camp. I am hoping to raise the money in any way possible, even if that's small bits at a time.
So, If you ever felt buying someone a lunch this is your chance to do it so. If 1000 of you buy me a lunch that costs $6.50, I would be on my way to Arizona :)

There is 60 days to collect the whole amount, but I would need it as soon as possible so I can declare my final decision that I will be a part of the World Athletics Center this coming training season. The training starts in October, but I would join the group there right after the graduation in December.
I am a Serbian national record holder in 60m hurdles indoors with a time of 7.67s ran this year in Albuquerque, NM. It would really mean a lot to me, and I believe this would allow me to make it to the next level and realize my dream of joining the other former Golden Bears who are now Olympians.
My current times are in 60m hurdles indoors 7.67s - World Indoor Championships standard is 7.74s, I would've ran there, but I couldn't due to NCAA D1 Indoor Championships that were held in the same week as the Worlds.
110m hurdles time is 13.63s - Olympic Games/World Championships standard is 13.60s; European Outdoor Championships standard is 13.90s (I will be a part of my home country national team at this competition this year in Zurich, Switzerland, this competition will be in mid. August of 2014)
Here is the link to my fan page on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/milanristic110
My email is milanristic110@yahoo.com please email me if you have any questions.
Every donation means a lot and it's greatly appreciated. Thank you!

That's the main reason why I need your help.
$6500 is a decent amount of money, but it will all go to the training expenses required by the camp. I am hoping to raise the money in any way possible, even if that's small bits at a time.

So, If you ever felt buying someone a lunch this is your chance to do it so. If 1000 of you buy me a lunch that costs $6.50, I would be on my way to Arizona :)There is 60 days to collect the whole amount, but I would need it as soon as possible so I can declare my final decision that I will be a part of the World Athletics Center this coming training season. The training starts in October, but I would join the group there right after the graduation in December.


I am a Serbian national record holder in 60m hurdles indoors with a time of 7.67s ran this year in Albuquerque, NM. It would really mean a lot to me, and I believe this would allow me to make it to the next level and realize my dream of joining the other former Golden Bears who are now Olympians.

My current times are in 60m hurdles indoors 7.67s - World Indoor Championships standard is 7.74s, I would've ran there, but I couldn't due to NCAA D1 Indoor Championships that were held in the same week as the Worlds.
110m hurdles time is 13.63s - Olympic Games/World Championships standard is 13.60s; European Outdoor Championships standard is 13.90s (I will be a part of my home country national team at this competition this year in Zurich, Switzerland, this competition will be in mid. August of 2014)

Here is the link to my fan page on Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/milanristic110


My email is milanristic110@yahoo.com please email me if you have any questions.Every donation means a lot and it's greatly appreciated. Thank you!

story:
Game description

This game is an action/adventure, singleplayer/multiplayer game. You, William Turk, are a soldier sent on a mission to hunt down and kill Joaquín Guzmán Loera, A.K.A. El Chupo Guzmán, a murderous, drug lord labeled as the "godfather of the drug world." You are a marine soldier, trained in the art of stealth. This is a man of great power and riches. He has many men at his disposal. He has strings linked to hundreds of people both rich and poor. You can trust nobody. Can you end the most powerful drug trafficker in the world?

Terrain

  • Grass
  • Water
  • Snow
  • Desert
  • Mountains

Vehicles

  • Jeep
  • Armored Car
  • Helicopter (Possible)
  • Boat
  • Tank (Possible)
  • Supply Truck

Weather

  • Rain
  • Day
  • Night
  • Clouds

Infrastructure

  • Roads
  • Rivers
  • Villas
  • Still deciding on more

Vegetation

  • Trees
  • Rocks
  • 3D Grass
  • Meadows
  • Vines
  • Bushes
  • More to come

Needs and Perks 

We need the funding to help buy the equipment to create this game. We are a small group of friends who have a true passion for games. We are using Cryengine 3 as our game engine. The money will also be used for buying the cryengine commercial liscense. If we don't reach our funding goal, we will keep saving up until we meet our requirements.

What you get: Some of the Perls will offer, a sweatshirt, character named after you, your name in the credits, your name on our website. Exclusive free DLC to you. A Sponsorship Jeep in-game with your name on it.

Your money will help us

  • Upgrade our equipment
  • Buy new equipment
  • New hardware
  • New software
  • Pay employees
  • Manage Websites
  • Advertise

Shout out for Us

If you can't help fund us, but you want to still help. You can help spread the word on twitter, facebook, steam, google plus, instagram, skype, whatever. This will help more than you think. Our Twittter is @Aurora_Gaming.

Image Gallery

    

 

 

About Us

We are a group of friends who like gaming. We just felt the need that we should help give back to the gaming community. This is what started Aurora Gaming. We are now making our first Game, Falling Reign. If you would like to help us, don't be shy, you can either help fund us here, or spread @Aurora_Gaming around twitter, it helps more than you think.

Join Us

If you are an experienced c++ programmer, Autodesk 3DS Max 3D Modeler, 2D Modeler, or Cryengine 3 Map Developer, send us an application to contact@falling-reign.com in the format of:

  • Title: (3D Modeler, 2D modeler, C++ coder, Map Developer, etc.)
  • Age: (Must be 18+)
  • Occupance: (Student, Adult, etc.)
  • Would you say you are beginner, intermediate, or expert? BE HONEST
  • Why do you want to join?
  • Full name (First, Last)
  • Examples of work you have done (If possible)

story:
Games lair a new hobby shop opening in bristol uk.

Hi my names mark  and i have been gaming for about 28 years and felt it was time to make one dream in to a reality. Since i was in my early 20s  have have had a dream of of running my own games shop. Now i am in my late 30s now is the right time to make this happen. For more info on me and my back ground check out my youtube channel markcrew162.

All money raised will go to setting up the shop and having the place decorated and stocked up. I do have a starting loan but to make this shop great I need a bit more money which would help give the shop a great start.

Any help that can be given i would be truely greatfull.

Goal 1.

If i hit $5000 or over i will set aside at least £500 to set up a gaming convention in bristol.

Should be open in october, and will have a good range of rpgs board games and some wargames as well. 

Thanks for all that had funded me.
