story:
English version :

WE ARE UNDER ATTACK

 

We are facing multiple waves of violent attacks led by unknown forces and at this time almost all communication systems are down, nevertheless we have one certitude : we are now at war !

All military forces are involved to protect the population and stop this invasion. We currently have no information to justify these terrible attacks. We don’t even know who they are, what they want nor where they come from.

Now it’s time for us to mount a counter-attack with all available forces from every country. That’s why PiewFighter AirForce is placed under the operational command of the International Coalition Agency.

For safety reasons identity and location of military headquarters and members must be kept secret and will be communicated to authorized personnel only.

Data is analyzed but we already know that our enemy is heavily armed, highly intelligent and endangering mankind.

We will post top secret files every week to all agents involved, so get prepared for your future mission.

     Stay tuned and get ready for the fight !

        We need you

 

                                                        http://www.piewfighter.com

 

 

Version française : 

NOUS SOMMES ATTAQUÉS

 

Nous faisons face à de violentes attaques d’une force inconnue et actuellement presque toutes nos communications ont été coupées, mais nous avons une certitude : nous sommes en guerre !

Toutes les forces militaires sont mobilisées pour protéger les populations civiles et stopper cette invasion. Nous ne disposons pour le moment d’aucune information qui pourrait justifier ces terribles attaques ni déterminer qui sont ces ennemies, ce qu’ils nous veulent et d’où peuvent ils venir.

Le temps est venu d’une contre attaque regroupant toutes les forces militaires de tous les pays afin de faire face à cet ennemi commun. C’est pourquoi la PiewFighter AirForce est placée immédiatement sous le commandement opérationnel de l’Agence International de la Coalition.

Pour des raisons de sécurité, l’identité et la localisation du quartier général ainsi que des membres de la coalition doivent rester secrètes et ne seront communiquées qu’ultérieurement au personnel accrédité.

Les premiers éléments ennemis récupérés sur le terrain sont en cours d’analyse mais nous savons de sources sûres que l’ennemie est lourdement armé, qu’il possède une intelligence vive et une soif de destruction terrifiante.

Nous vous transmettrons régulièrement des éléments classés secret défense pour que vous puissiez vous préparer à votre future mission.

Rester à l’affut et soyez prêt à vous battre !

 

                                                       Nous avons besoin de vous.

                                                           www.piewfighter.com

 

_____________________________________________________

  

Our project / Notre projet

 

 

English version :

ESCAPE (Game 1 for 15 000€ reached)

We are now at war against unknown forces. Your mission is to join as fast as possible the PiewFighter AirForce basement and grab your pilot suite. You'll have to make your way through the devastated city, dodge enemies' shots and defend yourself against heavy weaponised creatures destroying everything at site. This first game is a "run to survive" enhanced with shouting and dodging against the invaders.

 

STRIKE BACK (Game 2 for 40 000€ reached)

Congratulation, you're now a skilled pilote of the PiewFighter AirForce. Time has come to strike back without any compromise. You will be under the command of the Sergent Instructor ROD BROKIN who will be there to teach you and guide you throught your missions and strategical choices. Your ship, the PiewFighter is heavily weaponised but our enemies are numerous and equiped with unknown and advanced technologies.

 

UNDER COVER (Game 3 for 80 000€ reached)

As an undecover agent, you will be granted for top secret data that could change the path of history. You'll access to the most advanced weaponery and will have to afford the most dangerous missions. All complementary intel regarding your mission will be posted in time.

 

Version française :

ESCAPE (Jeu 1 avec 15 000€ récoltés)

Nous sommes en guerre contre une force inconnue. Votre objectif est de rejoindre le plus rapidement possible la base de la PiewFighter AirForce afin de revêtir votre uniforme de pilote. Vous devrez traverser une ville à feu et à sang, éviter les tirs ennemis et vous défendre face à des créatures puissamment armées qui détruisent tout sur leur passage. Ce premier jeu sera en mode "cours pour survivre" avec des actions supplémentaires. Il faudra combattre et se défendre contre l'envahisseur.

 

STRIKE BACK (Jeu 2 avec 40 000€ récoltés)

Vous êtes pilote au sein de la prestigieuse PiewFighter AirForce. Le temps est venu de contre-attaquer sans compromis. Vous serez sous le commandement du Sergent Instructeur ROD BROKIN qui sera là pour vous former et vous conseiller dans vos missions et choix stratégiques. Votre appareil, le PiewFighter sera lourdement armé mais les ennemies sont nombreux et disposent de technologies redoutables.

 

UNDER COVER (Jeu 3 avec 80 000€ récoltés)

En tant qu'agent infiltré, vous aurez accès à des données qui pourraient bouleverser le cours des choses. Vous bénéficiez d’armes confidentielles pour remplir vos missions. Vous recevrez les informations complémentaires nécessaires pour chacune de vos actions en temps et en heure.

  

_____________________________________________________

 

Counterpart / Contreparties

story:
Hi everyone. We’re Laia and Ian, founders of Sukubus Studio. We’re delighted to show you the first miniatures range we’ve developed on 3D for our studio. Thanks to this platform we are glad to show you our creations and would like to know your thoughts on them. We hope you like them as much as we’ve enjoyed developing them.

The idea came to us when deciding what would be the first miniature we’d create. We thought it nice to start with our logo’s mascot. We made a few sketches looking for inspiration, until Laia modeled Sukubus Fighter #2, to give it as prize in Fantasy Football competitions or other promotional events.  When we received the master model, we liked it so much that it led us to develop a whole team. We wanted to give to each miniature its own flair and personality, making them easy to recognize, playable and a delight to paint.


Sukubus Team is made up by a group of succubae arisen from the worst nightmares of mortals. In it there are diverse kinds of succubae that represent the diverse roles in a Fantasy Football match. We’ve prepared several stretch goals that will add to the team as the campaign develops.

Production will be made in high quality resin on a 28mm scale. We’re certain of the finishing of each miniature, as they will be made by our friends at RN Estudio, great professionals that have a lot of experience in this kind of campaigns.

This is the first master model that RN Estudio did for us before the campaign. This isn´t the final model, but it served to check the correct anatomical proportions and small details like spikes, horns or tails for the next models.



An example of a painted miniature by RN Estudio.

Mystical World has made these awesome Dark Stone Heads bases to complete the Sukubus Team. These magnificent art works fit perfectly with your miniatures.

We want to offer the best quality for our backers. That's why we have managed to make the production of Sukubus Dices with Chessex. A great customized dices company that get the best results.

Sukubus Star Shadow is a veteran Sukubus Dancer that improved her technique with infamous secret weapons. This miniature will be free for all those who have requested a Sukubus Team and will be a new reward for the rest of the backers.

Impaler demon is the ripper of your hidden senses. This miniature will be free for all those who have requested a Sukubus Team and will be a new reward for the rest of the backers.


Sukubus Spawn is an unpredictable twisted demon that changes her mood suddenly. This miniature will be free for all those who have requested a Sukubus Team and will be a new reward for the rest of the backers.

The last Stretch Goal is here. Fanatics is composed by the team mascot and a girl that wants to be the official team cheerleader. Do you think that she will get it?. This miniature will be free for all those who have requested a Sukubus Team and will be a new reward for the rest of the backers.

Thanks to your support we’ll be able to carry out production and all costs that it implies:

1- Master models creation.
2- Serial manufacturing of your miniatures.
3- Packing, shipping and taxes costs.


Thank you beforehand for your support. We’d like to thank particularly to all campaign collaborators and all those who have shared our links or send us funny comments.

RN Estudio: Crowdfunding manager, 3D print, cast and professional painting.

Mystical World: Customized bases.

Chessex: Customized dices.

Darkstone: Consulting; promotion, raffles.

Forja y Desván: Consulting; promotion.

Álvaro Pantoja García: Professional painting.

Patrick Davenne: Translation.

We expect to be able to deliver the product by January 2015. Thus, once the campaign is over, we’ll need 4 months to be able to send you your miniatures. In case of rewards such as painted or customized miniatures, delivery date may vary.

story:
Welcome to Torva Cattus

a revolutionary sim whose reason for being created is to help our majestic Felines. Torva Cattus, uses a fun realistic and fantasy mixed game setting to educate and entertain our players. In this game a player can rescue, nurse, breed and re-release wild feline species.  Torva Cattus is really a game of many experiences. There will be guided tours with our Snow Leopard mascot, Tara in our Cub Tracks account. She will show you all the ropes and fun exciting things to do within the pages of Torva Cattus. Parents do not worry; we have taken every possible measure to insure the safety of young surfers. We do ask that anyone wishing to join the site be 13 years of age or older. As Torva Cattus deal with real life issues, such as poaching, death and species reproduction.

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising funds to help continue to build the game. This game is an online simulation when it is complete it will be free to all players. The game play is highly unique, no two players will play the exact same game, choices made throughout the gaming process turn Torva Cattus into a unique setting for everyone. A game of this calibur requires a lot, we have to pay artists and coders for the game, purchase dedicated servers to insure the game is playable at all times even during updates. The money will be used to fund art and coding needs and place a down payment on a dedicated server, this will allow the game to Open to the public in Febuary.

The game has been in planning mode for 3 years and its full game play is ready to be executed, we are missing the funding to help back the plan and execute the game. That is where you come in, will you help us fund our game?

Your Perks:

  • Pledge $5 or more and get: 60 day upgraded account on torvacattus.com with Site Backer reputation applied to account. 1 Free Invite for a friend (Invite a friend with 14 days upgraded access)

  • Pledge $10 or more and get: 180 day upgraded account on torvacattus.com with Site Backer reputation applied to account. 2 Free Invite for a friend (Invite a friend with 14 days upgraded access)

story_txt:
Welcome to Torva Cattusa revolutionary sim whose reason for being created is to help our majestic Felines. Torva Cattus, uses a fun realistic and fantasy mixed game setting to educate and entertain our players. In this game a player can rescue, nurse, breed and re-release wild feline species.  Torva Cattus is really a game of many experiences. There will be guided tours with our Snow Leopard mascot, Tara in our Cub Tracks account. She will show you all the ropes and fun exciting things to do within the pages of Torva Cattus. Parents do not worry; we have taken every possible measure to insure the safety of young surfers. We do ask that anyone wishing to join the site be 13 years of age or older. As Torva Cattus deal with real life issues, such as poaching, death and species reproduction.What We Need & What You GetWe are raising funds to help continue to build the game. This game is an online simulation when it is complete it will be free to all players. The game play is highly unique, no two players will play the exact same game, choices made throughout the gaming process turn Torva Cattus into a unique setting for everyone. A game of this calibur requires a lot, we have to pay artists and coders for the game, purchase dedicated servers to insure the game is playable at all times even during updates. The money will be used to fund art and coding needs and place a down payment on a dedicated server, this will allow the game to Open to the public in Febuary.The game has been in planning mode for 3 years and its full game play is ready to be executed, we are missing the funding to help back the plan and execute the game. story:
Geekzonia is a free social virtual reality platform for geeks like us and geeks like you!

Imagine a GIGANTIC Comic-Con on an exotic alien planet, where you can meet your favourite celebrities, have a conversation in real time and ‘fan-girl’ to your hearts content (meeting someone famous in virtual reality is no less exciting, I know you freak out just from a re-tweet).

The kind of VR events we can host, could potentially evolve forever but for now imagine;

Fan Hangouts - head to the Sci-Fi zone, join international fan group discussions about Doctor Who, automatically find friends who are part of the same fandoms as you and regularly meet up with them in a spaceport or graveyard even if they live oceans away IRL (in real life).

Quiz Shows pitting fan groups against each other, with themed rounds like Name the Super Hero! Sing that Theme Tune! Reenact this Scene! (Did you just read that as a cheesy Game Show Host? Good.)

Viewing Parties for live events like eSports tournaments or exclusive 360° trailers and movies.

Workshops with eSports coaches, comic book writers/artists, cosplayers, VR vloggers or even virtual sculptors so you can learn how to create your own avatar upgrades, that you could then make and sell.

We envision businesses opening virtual shops in Geekzonia, where the staff working in VR, will be able to communicate face to face with worldwide customers like never before!

These events are only the beginning of our journey through time and space, as Geekzonia will always be working to bring you bigger and better adventures. Encouraging socialising is at the heart of everything we do, so you’ll soon find a family of geeky companions to explore with!

So far we have funded development ourselves and we’re already at the stage where unlimited users can strap on a VR headset, meet up within Geekzonia and have a good gossip!

Now we need your help to take it to the next level.

Our funding goal is $40,000. This will allow us to develop technology to stream in LIVE events and celebrity appearances. It will also help us deliver bigger and better zones sooner!

Every dollar donated will be rewarded handsomely with in-world freebies and double or triple dollars to spend on exclusive events, celebrity meet & greets, premium avatar extras, 3D printing and shopping! All donors will gain early access, be invited to exclusive virtual tours & automatically entered into our competition to WIN an Oculus Rift!

Other perks include VIP access to exclusive events, permanent fixtures in your honour and even a VR Wedding!

Once Geekzonia is ready you’ll be able to download & install Geekzonia from one of the VR app stores, like Oculus or Steam. You can then build a profile with your interests, and we can notify you of potential geeky friends!

Create a unique avatar, put on your virtual reality headset and dive in...

Geekzonia will be divided into zones, each with a distinct look and genre. Science-fiction, horror, fantasy, the possibilities are endless.

We're organising continuous VR events that will encourage socialising and our calendar for May is already filling up! You can read all about it here

There are lots of ways to support our mission, if you can’t afford to donate, help us spread the word by telling your friends and sharing this campaign on social media.

We may not always agree about what the best movies, video games, or comic books are but we’re all still passionate geeks, and we’re all Geekzonians.

***UPDATE***

22/02/17

A massive THANK YOU to our early funders, thanks to you we’ve reached 20% of our goal in the first week!

We are currently in talks with various booking agents. The idea of being the first Actor to meet fans in a Virtual Reality Comic Con is an exciting prospect and we hope to announce some fantastic Sci Fi stars soon, so stay tuned!

What kind of geeky celebrities would you love to meet at a Convention? Have you met any before? What made them a great guest?

Get involved on Facebook, twitter or Instagram, send us your photos of meet & greets and we’ll feature you!

Not sure who is more excited here, Jason Momoa or Alicia! Amazing Aqua-lady Cosplay from @aliciamariebody 

 

23/02/17

Once Geekzonia is up and running, we will require a very large team of people to keep things running smoothly, and we foresee this platform creating thousands of jobs worldwide. A lot of these people will spend their days working in Virtual Reality, from running a virtual store, to our VR Events Host Job which you can currently apply for here.

These roles won’t require technical knowledge so don’t be put off! You’ll obviously need excellent phone manner and communication skills, as people from all over the world will need to understand you. Much like The Voice what you look like couldn’t matter less, you won’t need to wear a uniform, or even do your hair! You can work from home, and home can be anywhere in the world – we’ll have a 24/7 schedule to maintain, so pick your hours and we’ll slot you in!

Valuable experience ranges from Customer Focused Retail backgrounds to Event Management, and even Drama skills! Maybe you’ve worked as a Convention Steward? We want someone warm and charming to welcome our users, to improvise if schedules change and to stay cool while looking after our celebrity guests!

 

 

Developing Geekzonia - The technical stuff!

 

Phase 1 (complete) involved the creation of a proof of concept 3D environment that could be experienced in virtual reality which features some 3rd party content. This allowed us to conduct research among our potential users, including Glasgow Comic-Con Cosplayers, and was followed up by a short period of R&D into available technologies.

 

Phase 2 (almost complete) involved the creation of the underlying technologies required to operate Geekzonia such as system design, network messaging protocols, multiplayer integrations and the user accounts system. A small amount of additional art work will be created to expand the proof of concept environment, the build will be optimised for the Oculus and HTC Vive platforms and a system will be developed to integrate 3rd party 360° and 2D video content. By the end of phase 2 Geekzonia will be ready for closed beta testing on an invite only basis.

 

Phase 3 (this is where we need your help) will expand the core of Geekzonia with several additional modules designed to enhance user enjoyment. These modules will enable features such as enhanced avatar customisation. We will also add new zones and dramatically expand existing ones. This will allow us to conduct a large scale open beta with thousands of concurrent users to test Geekzonia at scale.


Phase 4 (summer 2017) will be an ongoing release of new and improved features, modules and zones. Major planned features include additional VR platform and mobile VR support, giving users the ability to sell their own products in the virtual marketplace and user / brand created zones. We will continue to improve the underlying infrastructure and will respond quickly to feature requests.

We'd love to hear from you! What sort of VR Events, geeky celebs or perks would you like to see? Let us know in the comments below!

If you're a little fuzzy on Virtual Reality, or you're struggling to imagine this world we are building, read The Hitchhiker's Guide to Geekzonia here

 

FAQs

Q - How much does Geekzonia cost?

A - Free! We believe passionately in creating a virtual world that is free and open to everyone. Transaction fees on economic activity such as in world purchases will support Geekzonia in the future but it will always be free for everyone.

 

Q - How can I access Geekzonia?

A - Ideally through a VR headset. We already support Oculus Rift and HTC Vive with support for all other major VR platforms coming soon. If you don’t own a VR headset yet you can still try Geekzonia on any Windows PC or laptop.

story:
FULL VERSION BELOW                                                          VERSIONE ITALIANA

                                                      

Have you ever asked yourself, could I survive a journey around the world

with just change in my pocket?

Have you ever had a once in a life time adventure?

Would you risk everything to achieve your goal?


FULL VERSION:



                                     

No money world tour is the first web based global reality game which puts you right in the thick of the experience, gives you the desire to pack up your bags and rush out that door, to meet new people, see new places, to get into sticky situations and just as quickly, get out of them, to compete, to adapt to each unique environment, to face insurmountable problems, obstacles around every corner, and above all, the desire to be boundless, free!


No money world tour is a game where the protagonists (Web-Nomads) are real people and the players are users who can interact and engage with them and each other through a web based platform and/or a dedicated app, making it their duty to keep each protagonists' story alive, literally.

It's the real version of The Hunger Games, where the users through the interactive network are completely immersed and are able to control and effect the adventure of the Web-Nomads with just a click of the mouse!

Everyone has one life to live, a destination to get to, we are all in this game together!!

Adventures, explorers, solo travellers, dreamers, or simply wishers and watchers who have no time to really travel. For all of you (and those who are curious), I introduce you to the No Money World Tour: The world as you've never seen it. But soon enough, you will see just that, the world as you've never seen it, with your own eyes, from home or in person.

      

                        

All the video content of the game is shot by the Web-Nomads and supported by you, the users, a big web community ready to help the Web-Nomads, to comment on them, vote for them, observe their every action and communicate with them.


The game is like Second Life, but rather than graphics and sounds, the Avatars are real people.

EVERYONE on this green and blue earth, from all walks of life, all shapes, sizes and ages, deep down inside, yearns to be a nomad.

The daily grind, the 9 to 5, endless patterns, eat, work, sleep, repeat, we are bound to drive on these highways of so called living forever, but we are always looking for that turn off, towards freedom, away from the fast paced, the road rage and the all too familiar.

EVERYONE wants that lone chance to be strong, face your own inner fears, EVERYONE wants that singular opportunity to go back to their ancestral roots, alone, the unrelenting sun beating down, the chill of cold ice rattling through every inch of your body, with only your bare hands and your mind as survival tools, but in this game, also having the knowledge that there is someone out there, a friend that you do not know yet, who will help you in your most desperate hour.

                    

If we think man is just a rational being, than we fail to consider all of life's variables and possibilities.

If true happiness is only authentic when it is shared with others, then I will share my adventures, every intimate detail with you, my ups and downs, facing myself in the mirror, the real one and the societal one. I will share with you, as I overcome the depths of the seven seas, climb the highest peaks, share with you my authentic happiness, my authentic freedom.

This is the story of six people and six couples, that you chose to partake in the no money world tour.

70,000 euros are up for grabs and much, much more!

                                                                 

The Web-Nomads will be the 18 participants of the game (six single people and six couples), that will be selected by the users to partake in this first person adventure and will also be the Avatars of the web based community.

                                                    

                    After the selection, the Web-Nomads will be ready to participate in the greatest adventure of their entire lives.

There are some set rules to follow, but the most important component will be their ability to adapt and take part in a world tour with very little money.


             

 

The online community are the central players for the progression of this reality game.

Everything can be controlled through the website and the dedicated app via a tablet or smartphone.

the members of the community can:

  1. -Vote
  2. -Give suggestions to the Web-Nomads around the world
  3. -Organize meetings between themselves
  4. -Comment
  5. -Establish forums and chat
  6. -Participate and create blogs
  7. -Converse with each other and with the Web-Nomads
  8. -Decide upon the objectives of the Web-Nomads through forum discussions and voting
  9. -Give suggestions to the webmaster
  10. -Share files, text, videos and photos
  11. -Meet the Web-Nomads in person
  12. -Film and photograph the Web-Nomads and post these photos and videos on the site
  13. -Aid or create obstacles for the Web-Nomads
  14. - Constantly observe the life bar of the Web-Nomads

Everyone can access the website for free and download the app with it's basic functions. Users also have the option of purchasing the complete version or simply buying individual components.



The website for No Money World Tour will also act as a social network to share your own personal travel stories and information. The purpose for users to suggest travel itineraries and ideas, is so that other users on the site may find new friends and travel companions and may benefit from others' travel knowledge and possibly partake on an adventure of their own. Whether it be a long journey across several countries or continents, a weekend getaway or simply a work trip, users will be able to easily share their experiences with the ability to post photos, video, advice, suggestions and stories on the network through the website and/or the dedicated app, allowing the community to get to know each user a little better. Allowing other users to get to know you better through your posted experiences and constantly updated travels may give you as the user an advantage if you decide to be part of the Web Nomad selection process. Everyone is able to download the app and join the website for free to be part of the community, as well as have a chance to partake in the actual game itself. 


The judges of the reality game will be ten experienced travelers, including people who have travelled the world with little to no money or people who travel adventurously.

Each judge will have a personal icon displayed on the website as well as an in depth personal description about them.

Each judge will post daily comments about the game and give suggestions to the users.

The users can post questions to the judges, who will answer through an FAQ or directly to them, depending on the question. All the questions will pertain to the Web-Nomads, general curiosities and comments on the game. All other questions can be sent to game's administration, the webmaster and/or the press.

The winner of the game, if he/she/they want, can become a judge/judges for the next game.


A constantly updated life bar of the Web-Nomads allows users to see all the information required for them to have constant control over the progress of all the Web-Nomads;

The life bar highlights the following information of the Web-Nomads:

Components

Everyone that participates in the selection process (that will be described later) are allowed to utilize the entire app with all of it's functions and other users who wish to purchase the app can do so in it's entirety or each component separately. These components allow the community to play with the Web-Nomads, solo or between the other users. The individual components are the following:


Breaking news: These free functions allow the users to view updated daily video, audio and text of the Web-Nomads 


Vote: The webmaster sets up several voting scenarios for the users to participate with Web-Nomads (the details will be described in the following chapter)


Suggest: Through this function, users can suggest an itinerary, workplace, accommodation and any other ideas they may have for the Web-Nomads


Chat: Through this functions users can chat with other users and the Web-Nomads


Message: Through this function users can send messages to other players and the Web-Nomads


Movement: Through this function users can observe where the                      Web-Nomads go


Bank: Through this function users are able to view the Web-Nomads bank accounts and transaction history (described further in detail below)


Meeting: Through this function users can set up live meetings with other users


Blog and forum: Through this function anyone in the web community can set up a blog or forum about the game


On-air: The Web-Nomads are able to activate this function whenever they want. It allows the Web-Nomads to broadcast live video and/or audio to the entire community. When this function is active, the on-air icon will flash and the players will know they can access this function


Challenge:Through this function the users can suggest and create new objectives for the Web-Nomads. Examples of some challenges: Cross the boarder into another state within three days, meet with another Web-Nomad, sleep for three days in the streets, move at least 500km in one day, sleep in a cemetery, travel 300km on foot, etc


Radar: This function allows users to always see where the Web-Nomads are in the world and when they are close in proximity, gives the users the possibility to meet them. When a Web-Nomad is within 20km of a user, the radar icon will flash to indicate this


Flash: This function allows users to take photos or videos of Web-Nomads they meet and instantly post them on the network


Host: This function allows users to ask the Web-Nomad to host them in their homes


Trial: This function allows for users to suggest to the community to put a Web-Nomad on trial for rule infractions or something he/she/they has done wrong


Job: This function allows for users to help the Web-Nomads to attain work for money and/or points


Help: This function allows the Web-Nomads to request help from the online community


Hard work: This function allows the Web-Nomads who are in a difficult position financially or point wise, to ask the online community to give them hard work in return for money and/or points. The community can decide to allow or  disallow it


Money: This function can be accessed by either the Web-Nomads or the users. In case a Web-Nomad runs into serious financial problems making it impossible for them to go any further, the users may help the Web-Nomad out. In this case, every user is allowed to make a single donation of 50 euro cents, with the total amount for the entire community being 300 euros. This function can be accessed a maximum of three times per Web-Nomad, but every donation equals a loss of 1,000 points



                                  

Phase 1  Subscribtions

The first phase is for the user to subscribe to the website for the selection process of the Web-Nomads to take part in the reality game.

To subscribe to be a candidate in the selection process to be a Web-Nomad, would-be candidates must pay 7 euros for the single Web-Nomads category and 12 euro for the couples Web-Nomads category.   

                                                                

                                     

There will be a counter on every page of the website that will start at 100,000 and for every new user who subscribes, the number will 

decrease by one, (two for the couples selection subscribers).

 The first 5,000 subscribers can participate in the selection

process free of charge. The second group of 5,000 subscribers can participate for half price.

When the counter reaches zero, the game will commence. In one week's time from the final subscription,

voting starts for the selection of the Web-Nomads.

                                           

The 12 votes can be cast anytime during the

one month voting period. Subscribers do not have to be Web-Nomad candidates to take part in web month voting period.

In this phase, all members of the web community can create blogs and forums to decide who to vote for, from what location in the world the game should start from, the best route for the future Web-Nomads to follow, the possible travel and situational scenarios for the future Web-Nomads, discuss past travel experiences, post suggestions and many other things.

The results of the vote will be announced the day after voting closes, so everyone is unaware of who the Web-Nomads are until the very last moment.


Rules of the selection process


Anyone around the world, above the age of 18 years old, with a valid passport can partake in the selection process for the great adventure that is the “No Money World Tour”.  

                                                                                               

To participate as a candidate in the selection process, 

a user must post at least five photos online, with a self interview video (3 minutes max) describing why he/she or them would like to participate in this reality game and why they consider themselves to be a suitable and desirable candidate for a Web-Nomad. Along with the video interview, the candidate must also present a short written autobiography (this applies for both single and couple candidates).


The written autobiography must include these key components:

  • -Personal Description

  • -How I would like to participates in “No Money World Tour”

  • -Interests


  • -Philosophy


  • -Music, Movies, Books


  • -Types of People I enjoy


  • -One Amazing thing I've seen or done


  • -Places travelled to

Couple participants can be friends, family members or in a relationship, but the important thing about couple participants is that they participate as a pair. In the case of a mother daughter/mother son or father daughter/father son couple, the child must be at least 14 years old.


Phase 2 The Selection

From the selection process, 100 candidates will be chosen (50 couples and 50 single candidates). If several candidates have equal numbers of votes, the three judges of the game will decide which candidates are to be chosen. The 100 chosen candidates must release a second video. This video must be shot in a public space (5 minutes max), simulating a typical journey they may participate in within the game and an additional self interview (3 minutes max).

                                                                                                       

                               

Phase 3 

For the Web-Nomads to learn during orientation

Only three weeks prior to the start of the game the 18 Web-Nomads (six couples and six singles) will be informed that they will participate in the game. In the case that some of them refuse to participate, the next in line will become the selected Web-Nomad.

A date and location will be chosen anywhere in the world where the Web-Nomads must be all together to start the game.

All the travel expenses to the game's start location from the Web-Nomads current location will be covered by the organization.


                                               

Game Commencement

During these three days of orientation all the Web-Nomads will receive the No Money World Tour starter kit, which includes:


  • 600 euros in cash – 1000 euros in cash for couples
  • One empty backpack – two empty backpacks for the couples
  • One small tent and one or two small sleeping bags
  • One tablet
  • One small portable computer, including all the software required
  • One smartphone with an international sim card
  • One dedicated app on the tablet, computer and smartphone to track their location
  • Each Web-Nomad will have a separate bank account with no money inside, opened by the the game's administration. Each Web-Nomad is also given a credit card (due to the fact that traveling requires that some transactions can only be done with a credit card), but the Web-Nomads must find some means to put the money in this bank account. The organization has access to all of these bank accounts, including access codes and can control and view the transactions made with each bank account. The users may also view the bank accounts and transactions of the Web-Nomads.

                    

All the Web-Nomads are allowed to be bring their own personal effects with them. They are not allowed to bring with them additional cash (besides the cash given to them in their No Money World Tour starter kits), credit cards and/or bank cards



TRAVEL RULES

  • -There will be constant updated rankings of the Web-Nomads through their   life bars

  • - The Web-Nomads can choose to travel from west to east or vice versa
  • - There are no limitations placed on the Web-Nomads to travel from north to south and vice versa
  • -The Web-Nomads are forbidden to use additional funds besides the money they are give in the No Money World Tour starter kits or money they legally earn within the game
  • -Everyday the Web-Nomads must post on the website at least 10 minutes of video, where the web community can see what they are doing. The Web-Nomads may also live stream (with the on-air function) for ten minutes.
  • In case it is impossible for the Web-Nomad to post or live stream video due to something beyond their control (ie they are in a location with no electricity), they must make a video summary of the blackout days and post everything at a later date. In this case, the Web-Nomad must post the video summary within a week's time. In the case of no internet connection, the Web-Nomad must record everything and post the video at a later date.
  • -Everyday the Web-Nomads have to post a video journal (1.5 minutes minimum), where they describe the current day or their upcoming day ahead.
  • In case it is impossible for the Web-Nomad to post or live stream video due to something beyond their control (ie they are in a location with no electricity), they must make a video summary of the blackout days and post everything at a later date. In this case, the Web-Nomad must post the video summary within a week's time. In the case of no internet connection, the Web-Nomad must record everything and post the video at a later date.
  • -Everyday the Web-Nomads must post at least 20 lines of text where they describe their current day or their upcoming day.
  • In case of no internet connection, they still must write this description, and must post it within a week's time.
  • -The Web-Nomads must maintain a constant connection with the web community
  • - The Web-Nomads cannot spend more than 300 euros on the airplane tickets – 600 euros for the couples
  • -The Web-Nomads must travel to at least 15 countries around the world
  • -All the money the Web-Nomads earn can be used during their travels
  • -The Web-Nomads cannot accept monetary presents during their travels, all the money spent, must be money they earn
  • -The travel time for the world tour must be between 80 and 120 days
  • -Sometimes a challenge will be chosen by the web community for the Web-Nomad to participate in. The Web-Nomad can decide whether or not he/she/they will do it. If they complete the challenge, they will earn points and/or money, but if they do not wish to partake in the challenge they will receive nothing.
  • -In case a Web-Nomads looses or has his/hers/their tablet, smartphone, portable computer and/or credit card stolen , the organization will try to assist them as soon as possible. Prior to assistance, the Web-Nomad must make an effort to find a solution (ie an internet cafe, asking their host for assistance, etc)




                        

-Each Web-Nomad starts the game with 0 points. The winner of the game is the Web-Nomad with the most points (with the possibility of some Web-Nomads having minus points).


The Web-Nomads can acquire points in the follow ways:

Every ten days a vote will take place involving the entire web community.

The vote will open and close on a single day. The web community is asked to vote for their favorite Web-Nomad (one vote per user). The votes will be tallied up and points will be given to each Web-Nomad based on their overall ranking during the vote.


The users vote for their favorite Web-Nomad based on sympathy, the Web-Nomad's love of adventure, their ability to solve problems and get around obstacles, their amount of movement, etc. The entire web community before the voting day can discuss in the forums and chat with other users and with the Web-Nomads to share their opinions and solidify how they are going to vote. The users can create an online campaign for their Web-Nomads via a separate forum or chat space to support their favorite Web-Nomad,


-Challenges (described before)

At random times the web community can propose challenges for the Web-Nomad to complete. The amount of points awarded for each challenge is based upon the difficulty of the challenge.

An example of a challenge: Cross a boarder before the end of the week, sleep in different places four consecutive nights, earn 150 euros in four days, etc.


-Judges Votes

Like the users, each judge has the ability to vote every ten days. The judges must vote for their favorite Web-Nomad, but they must explain to the community why they voted in such a way. The votes will be tallied up and points will be given to each Web-Nomad based on their overall ranking during the vote.


-Time to complete the entire world tour

In the order that the Web-Nomads arrive back to the exact starting point of the game, they will be awarded the follow points:


-Country awarded points

At the start of the game, a specific country (chosen at random) will be presented to the Web-Nomads to travel to. If the Web-Nomad gets to this country, they will be awarded 8000 points.


-Countries travelled to

Every country travelled to (including small countries) by the Web-Nomads, they will be awarded 800 points.

      

    

                          

A Web-Nomad may receive a penalty in the case where a rule infraction has been made.

Some challenges and decisions may also result in a penalty (ex. asking for user donations).

-Breaking specific rules may result in a Web-Nomad being ousted from the game. The community may decide the gravity of the punishment.

-The Web-Nomad may also decide to leave the game at his/hers/their digression at any moment. In the case that one member of a Web-Nomad couple decides to leave, the other person may continue the game solo, but will receive a penalty of 3000 points.


 

The Web-Nomads who are selected are expected to use common sense at all times and respect the spirit of the game. They are expected to follow the game's rules and to try their best to win.

The most important factor for the Web-Nomads to realize is that winning isn't simply about getting to the finish line first, but that they maintain a high approval rating with the web community and the judges and the points earned through the challenges.

However there are controls set in place, so that if in the case a Web-Nomad does attempt to break the rules or sabotage the game and it is proven, the Web-Nomad will be immediately removed from the game and must find their own way back home with no assistance from the organization.

Through the dedicated app, the web community and the judges will be able to follow the movement of the Web-Nomads and in the case where abnormal movement is noted, that does not correspond with the Web-Nomad's community interactions, the Web-Nomad will be put on trial and adjudicated and sentenced by the web community and judges. The end result of a trial could be loss of points, complete a challenge or exclusion from the game.

The users can place a Web-Nomad on trial when something seems abnormal with the Web-Nomad by creating a case by him or herself and/or with friends, parents that are near to the Web-Nomad.

There are also official controllers (who are hired by the organization) that can investigate and pursue a Web-Nomad to intervene if something is not right. The Web-Nomad does not know the identity of the official controllers. Above all, the most important clarification, is that the users themselves are the ultimate controllers of the game.



-The first and second place winners will receive awards (first place will receive 50,000 euros and second place will receive 20,000 euros).

All the text, video and photos of the Web-Nomads will be summarized at the end of the game for the creation of 12 e-books. The proceeds from sales of these e-books will be given to the Web-Nomads. The first place winner will have a real book published about their adventures.

The winners can be couple or single Web-Nomads, but couples must share their winnings.



                                         

As perks we offer a number of advantages for the supervision of the game. Those who will sponsor the project through crowdfunding will benefit of our extra perks. For funds of 25 euros up we will offer limited edition gadgets. Thirty days before the end of the campaign we will be sending the gadgets only to those who support us. The tablets will also be shipped within 30 days along with the limited edition cover. We will send the entire creation of the App as soon as it is completed, before the launch of the game which is scheduled and due in April 2015.

Following is a summary of all the perks:


         



The cost of the first edition of No Money World Tour is quoted at 400,000 euros, without the use of sponsors or other financial contributors.                      

                             

Our initial goal is to raise 50,000 euros, that will fund the start up of the project, including the website, the dedicated app and all other costs, prior to the commencement of the actual game itself.

Of this 50,000 euros, 25,000 euros will used towards the technical side of the project, including the development of the website and dedicated app and the other 25,000 euros will be used for promotion and ad campaigns. If we raise funds above our original goal of 50,000 euros, this money will be used, so that less users will have to pay for the fully function app and to be a part of the selection process. If we raise more than 400,000 euros, the app and the selection process will be start before next spring.

We believe if we this project is fully realized, it will revolutionize the idea of games and social networks, because the users are able to participate in real time with both. We believe it will also revolutionize reality television, because the viewers, will not just be viewers, they will be participants who will have constant control of the characters they are watching and will have many different options to become fully immersed in the experience.

In the case the the first edition is a success, there will be the possibility of continuing with new and alternative editions of the game, for example: a local edition for each country, a couples or singles only edition, a family edition, a extreme adventure edition and many more. This is just the tip of the iceberg, that can evolve and change depending on the organization as well as suggestions from the players and users.

During a period where there is no game going on, the website and dedicate app will still be active and function as a forum for travel knowledge, where users can share their travels stories, long journeys or simply weekend getaways, as well as share travel advice.

Any contribution for the start up of this project, will also be a contribution to a new way of communicating, a new way of playing a game and a new way of travel.



WHO WE ARE

Just watch us:
story_txt:
FULL VERSION BELOW                                                          VERSIONE ITALIANA                                                      Have
you ever asked yourself, could I survive a journey around the world
with
just change in my pocket?
Have
you ever had a once in a life time adventure?Would you risk everything to
achieve your goal?FULL VERSION:                                     
No
money world tour
is the first web based global reality game which puts you right in
the thick of the experience, gives you the desire to pack up your
bags and rush out that door, to meet new people, see new places, to
get into sticky situations and just as quickly, get out of them, to
compete, to adapt to each unique environment, to face insurmountable
problems, obstacles around every corner, and above all, the desire to
be boundless, free!
No
money world tour is
a game where
the protagonists (Web-Nomads)
are real people and the players are users who can interact and engage
with them and each other through a web based platform and/or a
dedicated app, making it their duty to keep each protagonists' story
alive, literally.
It's
the real version of The
Hunger Games,
where the users through the interactive network are completely
immersed and are able to control and effect the adventure of the
Web-Nomads with just a click of the mouse!

Everyone has one life to live, a destination to get to, we are all in this game together!!Adventures,
explorers, solo travellers, dreamers, or simply wishers and watchers
who have no time to really travel. For all of you (and those who are
curious), I introduce you to the No Money World Tour: The world as
you've never seen it. But soon enough, you will see just that, the
world as you've never seen it, with your own eyes, from home or in
person.                              

All
the video content of the game is shot by the Web-Nomads and supported
by you, the users, a big web community ready to help the Web-Nomads,
to comment on them, vote for them, observe their every action and
communicate with them.The
game is like Second
Life,
but rather than graphics and sounds, the Avatars
are real people. 


EVERYONE
on this green and blue earth, from all walks of life, all shapes,
sizes and ages, deep down inside, yearns to be a nomad. 


The daily grind, the 9 to 5, endless patterns, eat, work,
sleep, repeat, we are bound to drive on these highways of so called
living forever, but we are always looking for that turn off, towards
freedom, away from the fast paced, the road rage and the all too
familiar.

EVERYONE
wants that lone chance to be strong, face your own inner fears,
EVERYONE wants that singular opportunity to go back to their
ancestral roots, alone, the unrelenting sun beating down, the chill
of cold ice rattling through every inch of your body, with only your
bare hands and your mind as survival tools, but in this game, also
having the knowledge that there is someone out there, a friend that
you do not know yet, who will help you in your most desperate hour. 
                    If
we think man is just a rational being, than we fail to consider all
of life's variables and possibilities.
If
true happiness is only authentic when it is shared with others, then
I will share my adventures, every intimate detail with you, my ups
and downs, facing myself in the mirror, the real one and the societal
one. I will share with you, as I overcome the depths of the seven
seas, climb the highest peaks, share with you my authentic happiness,
my authentic freedom. 


This
is the story of six people and six couples, that you chose to partake
in the no
money world tour.
70,000
euros are up for grabs and much, much more!                                                                 The Web-Nomads will be the 18 participants of the game (six single people and six couples), that will be selected by the users to partake in this first person adventure and will also be the Avatars of the web based community.                                                                        After the selection, the Web-Nomads will be ready to participate in the greatest adventure of their entire lives.There are some set rules to follow, but the most important component will be their ability to adapt and take part in a world tour with very little money.              

The
online community are the central players for the progression of this
reality game.
Everything
can be controlled through the website and the dedicated app via a
tablet or smartphone.
the
members of the community can:

-Vote

-Give
suggestions to the Web-Nomads around the world

-Organize
meetings between themselves

-Comment

-Establish
forums and chat

-Participate
and create blogs

-Converse
with each other and with the Web-Nomads

-Decide
upon the objectives of the Web-Nomads through forum discussions and
voting

-Give
suggestions to the webmaster

-Share
files, text, videos and photos

-Meet
the Web-Nomads in person

-Film
and photograph the Web-Nomads and post these photos and videos on the
site

-Aid
or create obstacles for the Web-Nomads

-
Constantly observe the life bar
of the Web-Nomads


Everyone
can access the website for free and download the app with it's basic
functions. Users
also have the option of purchasing the complete version or simply
buying individual components.The website for No Money World Tour will also act as a social network to share your own personal travel stories and information. The purpose for users to suggest travel itineraries and ideas, is so that other users on the site may find new friends and travel companions and may benefit from others' travel knowledge and possibly partake on an adventure of their own. Whether it be a long journey across several countries or continents, a weekend getaway or simply a work trip, users will be able to easily share their experiences with the ability to post photos, video, advice, suggestions and stories on the network through the website and/or the dedicated app, allowing the community to get to know each user a little better. Allowing other users to get to know you better through your posted experiences and constantly updated travels may give you as the user an advantage if you decide to be part of the Web Nomad selection process. Everyone is able to download the app and join the website for free to be part of the community, as well as have a chance to partake in the actual game itself. 
The
judges of the reality game will be ten experienced travelers,
including people who have travelled the world with little to no money
or people who travel adventurously.
Each
judge will have a personal icon displayed on the website as well as
an in depth personal description about them.
Each
judge will post daily comments about the game and give suggestions to
the users.
The
users can post questions to the judges, who will answer through an
FAQ or directly to them, depending on the question. All the questions
will pertain to the Web-Nomads, general curiosities and comments on
the game. All other questions can be sent to game's administration,
the webmaster and/or the press.
The
winner of the game, if he/she/they want, can become a judge/judges
for the next game.A
constantly updated life bar
of the Web-Nomads allows users to see all the information required
for them to have constant control over the progress of all the
Web-Nomads;
The
life bar highlights the following information of the Web-Nomads:
Components

Everyone that participates in
the selection process (that will be described later) are allowed to
utilize the entire app with all of it's functions and other users who
wish to purchase the app can do so in it's entirety or each component
separately. These components allow the community to play with the
Web-Nomads, solo or between the other users. The individual
components are the following:
Breaking
news: These free functions allow the
users to view updated daily video, audio and text of the Web-Nomads 

Vote:
The webmaster sets up several voting scenarios for the users to
participate with Web-Nomads (the details will be described in the
following chapter)
Suggest:
Through this function, users can suggest an itinerary, workplace,
accommodation and any other ideas they may have for the Web-Nomads
Chat:
Through this functions users can chat with other users and the
Web-Nomads
Message:
Through this function users can send messages to other players and
the Web-Nomads
Movement:
Through this function users can observe where the                      Web-Nomads go
Bank:
Through this function users are able to view the Web-Nomads bank
accounts and transaction history (described further in detail below)
Meeting:
Through this function users can set up live meetings with other users
Blog
and forum: Through
this function anyone in the web community can set up a blog or forum
about the game
On-air:
The Web-Nomads are able to activate this function whenever they want.
It allows the Web-Nomads to broadcast live video and/or audio to the
entire community. When this function is active, the on-air icon will
flash and the players will know they can access this function
Challenge:Through
this function the users can suggest and create new objectives for the
Web-Nomads. Examples of some challenges: Cross the boarder into
another state within three days, meet with another Web-Nomad, sleep
for three days in the streets, move at least 500km in one day, sleep
in a cemetery, travel 300km on foot, etc
Radar:
This function allows users to always see where the Web-Nomads are in
the world and when they are close in proximity, gives the users the
possibility to meet them. When a Web-Nomad is within 20km of a user,
the radar icon will flash to indicate this
Flash:
This function allows users to take photos or videos of  Web-Nomads
they meet and instantly post them on the network
Host:
This
function allows users to ask the Web-Nomad to host them in their
homes
Trial:
This function allows for users to suggest to the community to put a
Web-Nomad on trial for rule infractions or something he/she/they has
done wrong
Job:
This function allows for users to help the Web-Nomads to attain work
for money and/or points
Help:
This function allows the Web-Nomads to request help from the online
community
Hard
work:
This function allows the Web-Nomads who are in a difficult position
financially or point wise, to ask the online community to give them
hard work in return for money and/or points. The community can decide
to allow or  disallow it
Money:
This function can be accessed by either the Web-Nomads or the users.
In case a Web-Nomad runs into  serious financial problems making it
impossible for them to go any further, the users may help the
Web-Nomad out. In this case, every user is allowed to make a single
donation of 50 euro cents, with the total amount for the entire
community being 300 euros. This function can be accessed a maximum of
three times per Web-Nomad, but every donation equals a loss of 1,000
points

Web-Nomad, would-be candidates must pay 7 euros for the single

will be a counter on every page of the website that will start at

first 5,000 subscribers can participate in the selectionprocess free

the counter reaches zero, the game will commence. In one week's time

the great adventure that is the “No Money World Tour”.                                                                                                 To

This video must be shot in a public space (5 minutes max), simulating
a typical journey they may participate in within the game and an
additional self interview (3 minutes max).                                                                                                       
                               Phase 3 For
the Web-Nomads to learn during orientationOnly
three weeks prior to the start of the game the 18 Web-Nomads (six
couples and six singles) will be informed that they will participate
in the game. In the case that some of them refuse to participate, the
next in line will become the selected Web-Nomad.

A
date and location will be chosen anywhere in the world where the
Web-Nomads must be all together to start the game.

All
the travel expenses to the game's start location from the Web-Nomads
current location will be covered by the organization.
                                               
Game
Commencement
During
these three days of orientation all the Web-Nomads will receive the
No Money World Tour starter kit, which includes:

600
euros in cash – 1000 euros in cash for couples

One empty backpack – two empty backpacks for the couples

One small tent and one or two small sleeping bags

One tablet

One small portable computer, including all the software required

One smartphone with an international sim card

One dedicated app on the tablet, computer and smartphone to track
their location

Each Web-Nomad will have a separate bank account with no money
inside, opened by the the game's administration. Each Web-Nomad is
also given a credit card (due to the fact that traveling requires
that some transactions can only be done with a credit card), but the
Web-Nomads must find some means to put the money in this bank
account. The organization has access to all of these bank accounts,
including access codes and can control and view the transactions made
with each bank account. The users may also view the bank accounts and
transactions of the Web-Nomads.

                    
All
the Web-Nomads are allowed to be bring their own personal effects
with them. They are not allowed to bring with them additional cash
(besides the cash given to them in their No Money World Tour starter
kits), credit cards and/or bank cardsTRAVEL RULES

-There
will be constant updated rankings of the Web-Nomads through their   life bars

-
The Web-Nomads can choose to travel from west to east or vice versa

-
There are no limitations placed on the Web-Nomads to travel from
north to south and vice versa

-The
Web-Nomads are forbidden to use additional funds besides the money
they are give in the No Money World Tour starter kits or money they
legally earn within the game

-Everyday
the Web-Nomads must post on the website at least 10 minutes of video,
where the web community can see what they are doing. The Web-Nomads
may also live stream (with the on-air function) for ten minutes.


In
case it is impossible for the Web-Nomad to post or live stream video
due to something beyond their control (ie they are in a location with
no electricity), they must make a video summary of the blackout days
and post everything at a later date. In this case, the Web-Nomad must
post the video summary within a week's time. In the case of no
internet connection, the Web-Nomad must record everything and post
the video at a later date.

-Everyday
the Web-Nomads have to post a video journal (1.5 minutes minimum),
where they describe the current day or their upcoming day ahead.


In
case it is impossible for the Web-Nomad to post or live stream video
due to something beyond their control (ie they are in a location with
no electricity), they must make a video summary of the blackout days
and post everything at a later date. In this case, the Web-Nomad must
post the video summary within a week's time. In the case of no
internet connection, the Web-Nomad must record everything and post
the video at a later date.

-Everyday
the Web-Nomads must post at least 20 lines of text where they
describe their current day or their upcoming day.


In
case of no internet connection, they still must write this
description, and must post it within a week's time.

-The
Web-Nomads must maintain a constant connection with the web community

-
The Web-Nomads cannot spend more than 300 euros on the airplane
tickets – 600 euros for the couples

-The
Web-Nomads must travel to at least 15 countries around the world

-All
the money the Web-Nomads earn can be used during their travels

-The
Web-Nomads cannot accept monetary presents during their travels, all
the money spent, must be money they earn

-The
travel time for the world tour must be between 80 and 120 days

-Sometimes
a challenge will be chosen by the web community for the Web-Nomad to
participate in. The Web-Nomad can decide whether or not he/she/they
will do it. If they complete the challenge, they will earn points
and/or money, but if they do not wish to partake in the challenge
they will receive nothing.

-In
case a Web-Nomads looses or has his/hers/their tablet, smartphone,
portable computer and/or credit card stolen , the organization will
try to assist them as soon as possible. Prior to assistance, the
Web-Nomad must make an effort to find a solution (ie an internet
cafe, asking their host for assistance, etc)
                        -Each
Web-Nomad starts the game with 0 points. The winner of the game is
the Web-Nomad with the most points (with the possibility of some
Web-Nomads having minus points).
The
Web-Nomads can acquire points in the follow ways:
Every
ten days a vote will take place involving the entire web community.
The
vote will open and close on a single day. The web community is asked
to vote for their favorite Web-Nomad (one vote per user). The votes
will be tallied up and points will be given to each Web-Nomad based
on their overall ranking during the vote.
The
users vote for their favorite Web-Nomad based on sympathy, the
Web-Nomad's love of adventure, their ability to solve problems and
get around obstacles, their amount of movement, etc. The entire web
community before the voting day can discuss in the forums and chat
with other users and with the Web-Nomads to share their opinions and
solidify how they are going to vote. The users can create an online
campaign for their Web-Nomads via a separate forum or chat space to
support their favorite Web-Nomad,
-Challenges
(described before)
At
random times the web community can propose challenges for the
Web-Nomad to complete. The amount of points awarded for each
challenge is based upon the difficulty of the challenge.
An
example of a challenge: Cross a boarder before the end of the week,
sleep in different places four consecutive nights, earn 150 euros in
four days, etc.
-Judges
Votes
Like
the users, each judge has the ability to vote every ten days. The
judges must vote for their favorite Web-Nomad, but they must explain
to the community why they voted in such a way. The
votes will be tallied up and points will be given to each Web-Nomad
based on their overall ranking during the vote.-Time
to complete the entire world tour
In
the order that the Web-Nomads arrive back to the exact starting point
of the game, they will be awarded the follow points:-Country awarded pointsAt the start of the game, a specific country (chosen at random) will be presented to the Web-Nomads to travel to. If the Web-Nomad gets to this country, they will be awarded 8000 points.-Countries travelled toEvery country travelled to (including small countries) by the Web-Nomads, they will be awarded 800 points.                                    
A
Web-Nomad may receive a penalty in the case where a rule infraction
has been made.Some challenges and decisions may also result in a
penalty (ex. asking for user donations).
  -Breaking
specific rules may result in a Web-Nomad being ousted from the game.
The community may decide the gravity of the punishment.     
										       

-The
Web-Nomad may also decide to leave the game at his/hers/their
digression at any moment. In the case that one member of a Web-Nomad
couple decides to leave, the other person may continue the game solo,
but will receive a penalty of 3000 points. 

The Web-Nomads who are selected
are expected to use common sense at all times and respect the spirit
of the game. They are expected to follow the game's rules and to try
their best to win.
The
most important factor for the Web-Nomads to realize is that winning
isn't simply about getting to the finish line first, but that they
maintain a high approval rating with the web community and the judges
and the points earned through the challenges.
However
there are controls set in place, so that if in the case a Web-Nomad
does attempt to break the rules or sabotage the game and it is
proven,
the Web-Nomad will be immediately removed from the game and must find
their own way back home with no assistance from the organization.

Through the dedicated app, the
web community and the judges will be able to follow the movement of
the Web-Nomads and in the case where abnormal movement is noted, that
does not correspond with the Web-Nomad's community interactions, the
Web-Nomad will be put on trial and adjudicated and sentenced by the
web community and judges. The end result of a trial could be loss of
points, complete a challenge or exclusion from the game.

The users can place a Web-Nomad
on trial when something seems abnormal with the Web-Nomad by creating
a case by him or herself and/or with friends, parents that are near
to the Web-Nomad.

There are also official
controllers (who are hired by the organization) that can investigate
and pursue a Web-Nomad to intervene if something is not right. The
Web-Nomad does not know the identity of the official controllers.
Above all, the most important clarification, is that the users
themselves are the ultimate controllers of the game.
-The
first and second place winners will receive awards (first
place will receive 50,000 euros and second place will receive 20,000
euros).
All
the text, video and photos of the Web-Nomads will be summarized at
the end of the game for the creation of 12 e-books. The proceeds from
sales of these e-books will be given to the Web-Nomads. The first
place winner will have a real book published about their adventures.
The
winners can be couple or single Web-Nomads, but couples must share
their winnings.                                         
As
perks we offer a number of advantages for the supervision of the
game. Those who will sponsor the project through crowdfunding will
benefit of our extra perks. For funds of 25 euros up we will offer
limited edition gadgets. Thirty days before the end of the campaign
we will be sending the gadgets only to those who support us. The
tablets will also be shipped within 30 days along with the limited
edition cover. We will send the entire creation of the App as soon as
it is completed, before the launch of the game which is scheduled and
due in April 2015.Following is a summary of all the perks:         
The cost of the first
edition of No Money World Tour is quoted at 400,000 euros, without
the use of sponsors or other financial contributors.                                                   

Our initial goal is to raise
50,000 euros, that will fund the start up of the project, including
the website, the dedicated app and all other costs, prior to the
commencement of the actual game itself.

Of this 50,000 euros, 25,000
euros will used towards the technical side of the project, including
the development of the website and dedicated app and the other 25,000
euros will be used for promotion and ad campaigns. If we raise funds
above our original goal of 50,000 euros, this money will be used, so
that less users will have to pay for the fully function app and to be
a part of the selection process. If we raise more than 400,000 euros,
the app and the selection process will be start before next spring.

We believe if we this
project is fully realized, it will revolutionize the idea of games
and social networks, because the users are able to participate in
real time with both. We believe it will also revolutionize reality
television, because the viewers, will not just be viewers, they will
be participants who will have constant control of the characters they
are watching and will have many different options to become fully
immersed in the experience.

In the case the the first
edition is a success, there will be the possibility of continuing
with new and alternative editions of the game, for example: a local
edition for each country, a couples or singles only edition, a family
edition, a extreme adventure edition and many more. This is just the
tip of the iceberg, that can evolve and change depending on the
organization as well as suggestions from the players and users. 


During a period where there
is no game going on, the website and dedicate app will still be
active and function as a forum for travel knowledge, where users can
share their travels stories, long journeys or simply weekend
getaways, as well as share travel advice.

Any contribution for the
start up of this project, will also be a contribution to a new way of
communicating, a new way of playing a game and a new way of travel.WHO WE AREJust watch us:

story:
SharkPuncher is a super fun and interactive multiplayer smartphone racing game in which players compete to see who can punch the most sharks. 

After hearing a story about a kayaker out-paddling a shark, Micah wondered why the kayaker didn't just turn around and punch the shark in the nose. Then, the idea for Shark Puncher was born.

After many pivots, we have finally decided to stick to a racing style game where players can challenge their friends to beat their times. We also want to add in a real-time racing feature so 4 friends can all play each other at the same time.

There's a BIG twist:

We will donate 25% of profits from Shark Puncher to Plan International USA (www.planusa.org), which SEVN - the company making Shark Puncher - has elected to support. Plan’s strategy emphasizes community engagement and ownership as the means to address the needs of children around the world, and their community- based development programs focus on eight technical areas: Education, Economic Security, Water and Sanitation, Health, Sexual Health (including HIV), Emergencies, Protection, and Child Participation. The partnership will enable a goal to help eradicate malaria through education and safe practices in villages, starting in Togo and spreading throughout the rest of the world.

SharkPuncher is now available on the App store and is free; players can opt to purchase items to enhance the game experience.

To learn more about SharkPuncher, check out the website at:http://www.sharkpuncher.com

story:
BOTTLES NIGHT OUT - Drinking Game

I love drinking games. Sitting around with a group of friends with some beers and a deck of cards is how I've spent many weekend nights. But so many times my friends and I were out and about and didn't have a deck of cards to play a drinking game. So I decided to make a fun & hilarious drinking game video game for your phone or tablet so you can take it with you wherever you go. Plus this game is way funnier than a deck of cards :)

 

Bottles Night Out is a drinking game you play with up to 6 people. It can be played on your ipad or android tablet, or if you're out at the bar played on your cell phone.

GAMEPLAY :

The game play is simple and fun. It is filled with hundreds of crazy animations with your characters getting into all sorts of adventures.

 

Players take turns tapping drink icons. Each drink will take your character on a random wild animated adventure.

There are thousands of drink and animated adventure combinations so no 2 games will ever be the same.

Here are some screen shots from the game:

If it's a good adventure you get to give out drinks, but if its a bad adventure you have to take drinks. Our "Project Video" is filled with actual animations from the game.

There are also tons of your favorite aspects of regular drinking games such as crazy rules, truth or dare and even spin the bottle.

 

It has always been my dream to make video games. I created, wrote and designed every aspect of the game. It has been a full time job for me for the past year.

This is my 1st video game and so far has been funded completely by me. I am hoping to raise funds to finish paying for the programming of this game and for marketing costs. With your help, we can make this funny game become a success and make sure it's a must have for anybody that is drinking with some friends :) 

Because of the large scale of this game (8400 drink and adventure combos) I am about $4000 over budget on the programming of this large game. Hopefully thats where you awesome supporters come in.
I also have some fun and unique ideas for marketing. Such as hiring alchahol promo girls to promote the game in bar districts of big cities and college towns all across the country. Most apps dont really have a ground campaign that includes attractive girls and guys promoting their apps in and outside of bars. So I think this will be a 1st. If I can raise enough support I can make this idea a reality. Which I think will help this game become a huge success.
 
Thank you so much for even considering to support the game.
Have fun & Happy drinking :P

story:
Escape from Population Earth is about a bro named Jrah forced into homelessness and he knows why.

He must travel often which is in conflict with his agoraphobia . He must learn the proper way to embrace total abandonment so he may solve biological frailty.

Jrah the bro cautiously invents his own secret underground to safely reintegrate himself into the very system most hope squash his kind.

Later insights gained from hallucinations and imagination will be his weapon against the instinctive need of shelter.


If Escape from Population Earth is successfully funded you can play as Jrah through prison, through countryside, and large number other settings .


The game will be made using the Irrlicht Engine. Your camera(s) will be first person/third person. Available for platforms: Linux and Windows.

Subgoal A
@5,000 USD.
I reveal more about the setting and plot. I will release momentous artwork.

Subgoal B
@7,500 USD
Key gameplay like combat and player mechanics will be revealed in the form of text documents and other media.

Subgoal C
@10,000 USD
A vision document will be released and a forum will be opened up for feedback and suggestions about the game.

Subgoal D
@15,000 USD
A couple of immersive demos will be released. ( 1-2 months after project is funded )
