Hosting games for those that love to play them.  I want to create a Hosting base that is kind and friendly, helpful and supportive. If you are able to contribute, that is great and I thank you from the bottom of my heart. If you can't, then spread the word, you will receive the same thanks for doing just that :)
Cheers and thank you for taking the time to stop by.  :)

story:
Versione Inglese/a seguire/Versione Italiana

WHAT IS NABALL ?

IT IS THE FIRST AND ONLY MOUSE CONCEIVED AND DESIGNED TO ENABLEPEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES to interact with every video systems. It is the result of the joint effort of professors and researchers in industrial design, physics, materials engineering and a student of design, suffering from physical disabilities,  who worked on the audit of the mouse.

[People with disabilities interact with the environment around theirself through a series of actions carried out in ways not always understood or effective. Its task is to make this interaction easier and more effective, if necessary, through an activity of translation of expression or functional codes. In the current cultural and technological evolution there is an increasing interest in assistive technology. Rather than help, we can talk about aid system, in other words a set of hardware and software interacting with the user and the environment around.]

NABALL ISMUCH MORE THAN A SIMPLE MOUSE, DUE TO FLEXIBILITY AND ADAPTABILITY, is able to interact with all video systems, integrating IN A SINGLE SYSTEM the functions of all the devices on the market and in use.

This REVOLUTIONARY MOUSE can be used both by people unable to perform normally standard movements, both by people with different levels of physical disabilities in the upper limbs, and finally, by people without upper limbs using the accessory bracelet.


WHY DO WE NEED FUNDING?

The raising need to COMUNICATE, INFORM AND ENTERTAIN are making more and more important the role of interaction by media in the contemporary society. 

EVERYONE HAS THE RIGHT TO ASK, RECEIVE AND GIVE INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATE IDEAS THROUGH ANY MEDIA AND WITHOUT LIMITS OR BORDERS.

The fundraising campaign will be used to finance the activities of study, research and development of systems, products and services able TO ENABLE AND CONNECTEVERYONE TO THE CULTURE OF INFORMATION, ENTERTAINMENT AND MEDIA ASSISTANCE, ranging from able-bodied to the elderly people, from kids to people with temporary and permanent disabilities or without limbs.

The fundraiser will be used to transform into reality needs and desires of people. Having numerous grants it will be possible to build and develop the first working prototype of the mouse Naball. To achieve this first goal $32,000 are needed. By supporting this project in every possible way, disseminating information between contacts friends and relatives will be possible to speed up the construction and implementation of the new mouse for everything and everyone.

BECOME A BUILDER OF DREAMS ........!!!

WHAT ABOUT THE ADVANTAGES OF NABALL?

With Naball, designed with the intent to simplify the access and interaction with computer systems to all users, people without disabilities, the elderly, children and people with temporary and permanent disabilities, it will be possible to:

ALLOW people with disabilities and without upper limb - hand - to interact completely with all video systems and software on the market;

PREVENT the onset of diseases derived from the continuing use of the mouse;

MINIMIZE the effort and the necessary movements to work on the computer, change channels on TV and play;

SIMPLIFY the procedures for interaction with all multimedia systems to communicate, work and entertain;

SPEED UP the interaction with all multimedia systems;

USE in a customized way, in the space and on any type of surface systems of interaction;

SIMPLIFY the interaction with game consoles to children under the age of 10 years;

ENABLE elderly people to use video systems while minimizing operations.


WHICH MEETS THE NEEDS NABALL MOUSE?

Needs to communicate, work, learn, entertain through computers and multimedia tools highlights the growing need for a faster, immediate and easy interaction. Input devices with input video systems such as mouse, joystick or remote controls currently on the market detect a series of constraints that limit the user's actions and therefore do not provide a simple, fast and effective interaction. The continuous use of the mouse may also, for the obliged position to use on a surface, can cause the onset of DISEASES SUCH AS TENDONITIS HAND OR CARPAL TUNNEL SYNDROME THE EFFECTS of which incur musculoskeletal disorders. Moreover, must be emphasized that THE CURRENT FORMAL AND FUNCTIONAL FEATURES OF DEVICES MAKE DIFFICULT THE USE OF VIDEO SYSTEMS AND COMPUTERS TO PEOPLE WITH MOTOR TEMPORARY AND PERMANENT DISABILITIES.

In this conditions, in fact, the need to interact with the multimedia tools is amplified but current systems sometimes make impossible to use completely computers or software, partially fulfilling some functions. Scanner emulators or ocular pointing devices, for example, are slow and imprecise and need to be combined with a mouse to allow all the functions required. Often people with disabilities are not able to coordinate the movements in a way sufficient to operate these buttons.


WHAT ABOUT THE FEATURES OF NABALL?



AUTOMATIC FUNCTION

With the mouse Naball you can connect with ease, disconnect and reconnect to the computer without performing any additional steps, there is not a conventional position or an association between its direction and screen.  


FIRST AND UNIQUE TOUCH SURFACE CURVE

The mouse Naball is covered with a touch-sensitive, capacitive type surface connected to the electronic core. For this reason you can enter input through slight touches of its surface, without applying a pressure on it. As a result it simplifies the joint movements. Due to the uniformity and homogeneity of the external surface is also possible to enter an input in any point of the external surface of the spherical shape device.



FLEXIBILITY IN USE

You can hold and use the mouse Naball regardless of the vertical or horizontal position of the screen.

It can be used both by people unable to perform normally standard movements, both by people with different levels of physical disabilities in the upper limbs, and finally, by people without upper limbs (specifically the hands).

Therefore, it can be used in the following ways:

- Holding the device into the palm of your hand and moving it, rotating and translating it into the space;

- Putting the device on any surface and moving the ball, rotating and translating it, on a plan;

- Using the device on the charging base and rotating it;

- Anchoring the device to the shape memory cuff, putting it on a surface and moving, rotating and translating it, on the plan.



THE MAGIC OF TOUCHES WITH THE FIRST SPHERICAL TOUCH MOUSE NABALL

RAPID ROTATIONAL ACCELERATION

This command allows you to enter an input through the fast-moving acceleration towards right or to the left.




CLICK

This command allows the user to enter an input through a single click on any point of the external surface of the sphere, without any conventional button or holding the mouse into the palm of your hand and rotating it in space, holding the mouse on the worktable or any surface, or anchoring it to the mouse accessory cuff.



DOUBLE CLICK

This command allows the user to open the file by double clicking on any point on the external surface of the sphere, without any conventional button,  holding the mouse into the palm of your hand and rotating it in space,  holding the mouse on the worktable or any surface, or anchoring the mouse to the accessory cuff.




SCROLL 

This command allows the user to scroll the window on the desktop PC and / or on the TV screen through the linear touch on any point of the external surface of the mouse.


CHARGING THE MOUSE

To recharge, as well as to use it, the device can be put on the base in any position. The charging takes place by induction, and therefore does not require any electrical connector between base and device.

For these reasons the mouse Naball:

- Does not require a predetermined position, neither for the charging or use of the device into the charging cradle.

- There are no electrical connections between the mouse and the base that can interrupt the continuity and uniformity of the surface, in this way is avoided any risk situation due to spilled liquids on the device and on the base.




SHAPE MEMORY ACCESSORY CUFF, ADAPTABLE AND FLEXIBLE

The mouse has a shape memory accessory bracelet equipped with an interactive display and an anchoring system.

Due to its shape-memory material, the structure of the bracelet is adaptable to any type of limb, even to people without hands or suffering from total or partial paralysis of the hands.

After you put the mouse in the anchoring system, is possible to put the cuff at the wrist/forearm of the user without hands just through a helical winding programmed for different needs. It enables users to make offsets and rotation of the ball on a plan and interact with the computer without the use of hands.

The cuff has an interactive display to interact with the mouse and with the computer through the touch of the surface or entering voice commands.



THANKS FOR YOUR ATTENTION

video made by designer Elvira Passero

brand made by phd arch. Giuseppe Vaccaro


TEAM WORKING GROUP

DICDEA DEPARTMENT_SECOND UNIVERSITY OF NAPLES

Prof. arch. Mario Buono 

phd arch. Sonia Capece

designer Pasquale Salzillo

The team of the Design Department of Civil DICDEA_Ingegneria, Design, Construction and Environment hosts researchers and teachers of different areas including designers, structural engineers, experts in innovative materials and multimedia communications, conducts applied research, industrial research and development industries with new products and companies operating on national and international territory through the tools of design and innovation in a perspective of enhancing and internationalization of local resources. The constant and consistent collaborative relationships with businesses and research centers located throughout the area allow good integration of skills and led the results in terms of innovative products and patents. The Department is incardinated the International Doctorate in Design and Innovation established with the Escuela Politecnica Universidad de Malaga, with the Technical University of Lisbon and the Polytechnic Institute of Castelo Branco.


CNR - Institute for Composite and Biomedical Materials - ICMB

Prof. XUAN WANG 

The Institute conducts research, development and technology transfer and training in

the following scientific areas and with regard to the following issues: "Polymeric materials, composites and nanostructures with structural and functional characteristics programmed"; "Technologies of the process of polymers, composites and nanostructures," "Polymeric materials and composites for tissue engineering and regenerative medicine " technology Transfer ". The main mission of the Institute is the growth of technical and scientific expertise for the maintenance and progression of the level of excellence in the field of polymer composite materials and in the field of biomaterials.

CNR – Istituto Superconduttori, Materiali Innovativi e Dispositivi ‐ SPIN

Prof. Eugenio Amendola

Prof. Mario Montanino

The SPIN CNR Institute carries out research in the field of advanced superconducting materials and other materials and innovative electronic devices for power, conducting experimental and theoretical studies and developing micro and nano electronic devices and innovative devices based on superconducting oxides and organic materials nano-structured.

Physical Sciences Department ‐ Federico II

Prof. Nicola Spinelli

The Department of Physical Sciences (DSF) of the University of Naples Federico II includes several areas

subjects: Physics Astroparticle and subnuclear physics, Astrophysics, Biophysics, Computer Science, Physics Education, Geophysics, Nuclear Physics, Material Physics, Theoretical Physics, Methodologies Applied Physics. The DSF works in synergy with other national research institutions: National Institute of Nuclear Physics, National Research Council, Interuniversity Consortium for the Physical Sciences of Matter, National Institute of Geophysics and Volcanology. Some activities are developed with the regional Centres of Competence AMRA and Technology. The research is also carried out as part of numerous international collaborations.

MCM Techno Consulting

Ing. Luca Aiello

Ing. Luca De Rosa

The MCM Techno is a consulting firm that provides integrated services of engineering, management and finance in the field of industrial research. Founded in 2000 with the belief that the constant innovation of products and industrial processes was a most critical factor for the competitiveness of

Italian companies. The MCM Techno is specialized in the development of new products in collaboration with industrial enterprises and in setting up and management of financial incentives for public and private investment in developing new products and technologies to industry and technology services. MCM Techno operates in various sectors, such as industry Chemistry formulations, the industry's Transformation of Plastics and Lapidei, Biotechnology, Information Technologies and Telecommunications, Productions of Means of Transport and in the Food System.









COS’È IL MOUSE NABALL?

È il primo e unico mouse pensato per TUTTO e per TUTTI

Brevetto di Invenzione Industriale numero_ NA2011A000031

Estensione PCT numero_PCT/IT2012/000217

NABALL È IL PRIMO E UNICO MOUSE PENSATO E PROGETTATO PER CONSENTIRE AI DIVERSAMENTE ABILI di interagire con tutti i sistemi video. È il risultato di un lavoro congiunto di docenti e ricercatori dell’area del disegno industriale, docenti e ricercatori di fisica e ricercatori in ingegneria dei materiali e un allievo designer, affetto da disabilità motoria, che ha collaborato alla verifica del mouse.

[La persona con disabilità si rapporta con l’ambiente circostante mediante una serie di azioni svolte attraverso modalità non sempre comprensibili o efficaci. Il compito dell’ausilio è quello di facilitare questo rapporto e l’efficacia delle azioni, se necessario, attraverso una vera e propria opera di traduzione di codici espressivi o funzionali. Nell’attuale situazione di evoluzione tecnologica e culturale, si registra un fortissimo incremento dell’interesse verso gli ausili tecnologici. Più che di ausilio si può parlare di sistema di ausilio, da intendere come un complesso insieme di hardware e software che interagiscono con la persona e l’ambiente circostante.]

NABALL È MOLTO PIÙ DI UN SEMPLICE MOUSE, GRAZIE ALLA MASSIMA FLESSIBILITÀ E ADATTABILITÀ, è in grado di interagire con tutti i sistemi video, integrando in un sistema unico le funzioni di tutte le periferiche in commercio e in utilizzo. Il rivoluzionario mouse può essere utilizzato sia da persone in grado di svolgere normalmente i movimenti standard, sia da persone con diversi livelli di disabilità motoria agli arti superiori fino a persone prive di arti superiori con l’accessorio a bracciale.



PERCHE' ABBIAMO BISOGNO DI FONDI ? 

Il crescente bisogno di COMUNICARE, INFORMARSI, e INTRATTENERSI rendono sempre più rilevante e nevralgico il ruolo della interazione mediatica nella società contemporanea. 

CIASCUNO HA IL DIRITTO DI CHIEDERE, RICEVERE E COMUNICARE INFORMAZIONI E IDEE ATTRAVERSO QUALSIASI MEZZO E SENZA LIMITI NÉ FRONTIERE.

La campagna raccolta fondi servirà per finanziare l’attività di studio, ricerca e sviluppo di sistemi, prodotti e servizi in grado di ABILITARE E CONNETTERE TUTTI VERSO LA CULTURA DELL’INFORMAZIONE, DELL’INTRATTENIMENTO E DELL’ASSISTENZA MEDIATICA, dalle persone normodotate agli anziani; dai bambini alle persone con disabilità motorie temporanee e permanenti fino a persone privi di arti.

La raccolta fondi servirà per trasformare in realtà i bisogni e i desideri delle persone, grazie ai numerosi contributi sarà possibile COSTRUIRE E SVILUPPARE IL PRIMO MODELLO FUNZIONANTE DEL MOUSE NABALL. Per ottenere questo primo traguardo sono necessari $ 32,000. Sostenendo questo progetto in tutti i modi possibili, diffondendo le informazioni tra i contatti, amici e parenti, sarà possibile accellerare la costruzione e realizzazione del NUOVO MOUSE PER TUTTO E PER TUTTI. 

DIVENTA ANCHE TU UN COSTRUTTORE DI SOGNI……..!!!


QUALI SONO I VANTAGGI DEL MOUSE NABALL? 

GRAZIE AL MOUSE NABALL, progettato con l’intento di semplificare l’accesso e l’interazione con i sistemi informatici a tutte le utenze, persone normodotate, anziani, bambini e persone affette da disabilità motorie temporanee e permanenti, SARÀ POSSIBILE:

PERMETTERE alle persone con disabilità motorie e prive di arti superiori – mano – di interagire con tutti i sistemi multimediali e software in commercio in maniera completa;

EVITARE l’insorgere di dolori e infiammazioni;

RIDURRE al minimo lo sforzo e i movimenti necessari per lavorare al pc, cambiare i canali in tv e giocare;

SEMPLIFICARE le modalità d’interazione con tutti i sistemi multimediali per comunicare, lavorare e intrattenersi;

VELOCIZZARE l’interazione con tutti i sistemi multimediali;

UTILIZZARE in maniera personalizzata, nello spazio e su qualsiasi tipologia di superficie i sistemi d’interazione;

PERMETTERE alle persone anziane di utilizzare i sistemi multimediali riducendo al minimo le operazioni;

FACILITARE l’interazione con le console game ai bambini con un’età inferiore ai 10 anni.


QUALI ESIGENZE SODDISFA IL MOUSE NABALL? 

Esigenze quali comunicare, lavorare, informarsi, intrattenersi attraverso i computer e gli strumenti multimediali evidenziano il crescente bisogno di un’interazione veloce, immediata e facile. I dispositivi di immissione input con i sistemi video quali mouse, joystick o telecomandi attualmente in commercio rilevano una serie di vincoli che limitano le azioni dell’utente e di conseguenza non soddisfano i bisogni di un’interazione semplice, veloce ed efficace. L’utilizzo continuativo dei mouse inoltre, per la costrizione della posizione d’impiego su una superficie, provoca l’insorgere di PATOLOGIE QUALI TENDINITE ALLA MANO O LA SINDROME DEL TUNNEL CARPALE  i cui effetti incorrono in disturbi muscolo‐scheletrici. Bisogna evidenziare inoltre che LE CARATTERISTICHE FORMALI E FUNZIONALI DEI MOUSE IN USO LIMITANO L’UTILIZZO DEI SISTEMI VIDEO E DEL COMPUTER DA PARTE DI PERSONE AFFETTE DA DISABILITÀ MOTORIE TEMPORANEE E PERMANENTI.. Nel caso specifico, difatti, l’esigenza di interagire con gli strumenti multimediali si amplifica e i sistemi d’ausilio in uso rendono talvolta impossibile un utilizzo completo dei computer e di tutti i software in commercio poiché soddisfano parzialmente alcune funzioni; gli emulatori a scansione o i dispositivi a puntamento oculare, ad esempio, oltre ad essere lenti e imprecisi, devono necessariamente essere abbinati con i mouse per consentire la complessità di tutte le funzioni richieste e spesso accade che le persone con disabilità non siano in grado di coordinare i movimenti in modo sufficiente per azionare tali pulsanti.


QUALI SONO LE FUNZIONI DEL MOUSE NABALL? 

AUTOINSTALLAZIONE

il mouse Naball consente di avviare e/o riavviare le comunicazioni tra il mouse e il computer automaticamente, senza alcuna procedura di installazione, senza alcun posizionamento convenzionale e indipendentemente dall’orientazione assunta rispetto allo schermo.


PRIMA E UNICA SUPERFICIE TOUCH CURVA

il mouse Naball è rivestito da una superficie sensibile al tocco del tipo capacitivo collegata al nucleo elettronico. Questo consente l’immissione dei comandi di input sulla superficie attraverso lievi sfioramenti senza la necessita di applicare una forza di pressione, agevolando e semplificando, in tal senso, i movimenti articolari. Grazie all’uniformità e omogeneità della superficie esterna è possibile, inoltre, immettere input su qualsiasi punto della superficie esterna del dispositivo di puntamento di forma sferica.


FLESSIBILITA' DI UTILIZZO

è possibile impugnare e utilizzare il mouse Naball indipendentemente dalla disposizione verticale oppure orizzontale dello schermo. Questo consente di utilizzare il nuovo mouse sia da persone in grado di svolgere normalmente i movimenti standard, sia da persone con diversi livelli di disabilità motoria agli arti superiori fino a persone prive di arti superiori (nello specifico le mani).

Pertanto l’uso può avvenire nelle seguenti modalità:

- tenendo il dispositivo nel palmo della mano e imprimendo movimenti di rotazione e traslazione nello spazio;

- poggiando il dispositivo su di una qualsiasi superficie e imprimendo movimenti di rotazione traslazione della sfera sul piano;

- utilizzando il dispositivo sulla base di ricarica e imprimendo movimenti di rotazione;

- ancorando il dispositivo al bracciale a memoria di forma poggiandolo su qualsiasi superficie e imprimendo movimenti di rotazione traslazione della sfera sul piano.



LA MAGIA DEI TOCCHI CON IL PRIMO MOUSE SFERICO TOUCH NABALL 



RAPIDA ACCELLERAZIONE ROTAZIONALE

questo comando consente di immettere un input attraverso il movimento rapido di accelerazione verso destra o verso sinistra





CLIC

questo comando consente di immettere un input attraverso un singolo clic su qualsiasi punto della superficie esterna della sfera, senza alcun tasto convenzionale, sia tenendo il mouse nel palmo della mano e ruotandolo nello spazio, sia tenendo il mouse sul piano di lavoro o su qualsiasi superficie e sia ancorando il mouse all’accessorio bracciale.




DOPPIO CLIC

questo comando consente di aprire i file attraverso un doppio clic su qualsiasi punto della superficie esterna della sfera, senza alcun tasto convenzionale, sia tenendo il mouse nel palmo della mano e ruotandolo nello spazio, sia tenendo il mouse sul piano di lavoro o su qualsiasi superficie e sia ancorando il mouse all’accessorio bracciale.




SCROLL

questo comando consente di scorrere la finestra sul desktop del pc e/o sullo schermo del televisore attraverso lo sfioramento lineare su qualsiasi punto della superficie esterna del mouse.


RICARICA DEL MOUSE

Per la ricarica come per l’uso, il dispositivo può essere poggiato sulla base in qualunque posizione. La ricarica avviene per induzione e quindi non richiede alcun connettore elettrico tra la base ed il dispositivo.

Pertanto:

- non è richiesto un posizionamento predeterminato né per la carica né per l’uso del dispositivo sulla base di ricarica

- non ci sono connessioni elettriche connettori elettrici tra il mouse e la base né connettori sul dispositivo che interrompano la continuità e l’uniformità della superficie, così pure è evitata qualunque situazione di rischio dovuta a liquidi versati sul dispositivo e sulla base.

La ricarica si attiva automaticamente al posizionamento del mouse sulla base e si interrompe automaticamente a ricarica completata. La ricarica avviene anche durante l’uso, seppure può richiedere tempi più lunghi sia per il simultaneo uso di energia sia per le variazioni di posizione rispetto alla posizione ottimale di ricarica.




ACCESSORIO BRACCIALE A MEMORIA DI FORMA 

Il mouse è costituito da un accessorio a bracciale a memoria di forma corredato da un display interattivo e un sistema di ancoraggio.

La struttura del bracciale consente di adattarsi a qualsiasi tipologia di arto grazie al materiale a memoria di forma e prevede l’utilizzo da parte di persone prive delle mani o affette da paralisi totali o parziali delle mani.

Infatti il bracciale, una volta collocato il mouse nel sistema di ancoraggio, viene fissato al polso/avambraccio dell’utilizzatore “privo delle mani” mediante un avvolgimento elicoidale programmato opportunamente rispetto alle diverse esigenze.

Questo consente di effettuare movimenti di rotazione traslazione della sfera sul piano e di interagire con il computer senza l’ausilio delle mani.

Il bracciale presenta un display interattivo che consente di interagire con il mouse e con il computer attraverso lo sfioramento della superficie touch o l’immissione di comandi vocali.

GRAZIE PER L'ATTENZIONE.....!



TEAM DI LAVORO

Dipartimento DICDEA_Seconda Università degli studi di Napoli

Prof. arch. Mario Buono

phd arch. Sonia Capece

designer Pasquale Salzillo

Il gruppo del Design del Dipartimento DICDEA_Ingegneria Civile, Design, Edilizia e Ambiente ospita ricercatori e docenti di differenti aree tra cui designer, strutturisti, esperti in materiali innovativi e in comunicazione multimediale, svolge attività di ricerca applicata, ricerca industriale e sviluppo nuovi prodotti con industrie e aziende operanti sul territorio nazionale e internazionale, attraverso gli strumenti del design e dell’innovazione in un’ottica di valorizzazione e internazionalizzazione delle risorse locali. Le costanti e consistenti relazioni di collaborazione con le imprese e i centri di ricerca dislocati sul territorio consentono una buona integrazione delle competenze e hanno condotto i risultati in termini di prodotti innovativi e brevetti. All’interno del Dipartimento è incardinato il Dottorato Internazionale in Design e Innovazione istituito con la Escuela Politecnica dell’Universidad de Malaga, con il Politecnico di Lisbona Instituto e con il Politécnico de Castelo Branco.

CNR – Istituto per i Materiali Compositi e Biomedici ICMB

Prof. XUAN WANG

L'Istituto svolge attività di ricerca, valorizzazione e trasferimento tecnologico e di formazione neiseguenti settori scientifici e relativamente alle seguenti tematiche: "Materiali polimerici, compositi e nanostrutture con caratteristiche strutturali e funzionali programmate"; "Tecnologie di processo di polimeri, compositi e nanostrutture"; "Materiali polimerici e compositi per l'ingegneria dei tessuti e medicina rigenerativa"; "Trasferimento tecnologico". La missione principale dell'Istituto è

l'accrescimento delle competenze tecnico‐scientifiche per il mantenimento e la progressione del livello di eccellenza nel settore dei materiali compositi polimerici e nel settore dei biomateriali, anche per favorire l'implementazione delle conoscenze in nuovi prodotti e/o processi.

CNR – Istituto Superconduttori, Materiali Innovativi e Dispositivi ‐ SPIN

Prof. Eugenio Amendola

Prof. Mario Montanino

L’Istituto CNR SPIN svolge ricerca avanzata nel campo dei materiali superconduttori e altri materiali innovativi per dispositivi elettronici e per l’energetica, conducendo studi sperimentali e teorici e sviluppando micro e nano dispositivi elettronici superconduttori e dispositivi innovativi basati su ossidi e su materiali organici e nano‐strutturati.

Dipartimento di Scienze Fisiche ‐ Federico II

Prof. Nicola Spinelli

Il Dipartimento di Scienze Fisiche (DSF) della Università Federico II di Napoli include diverse aree

tematiche: Fisica della Astroparticelle e Fisica Subnucleare, Astrofisica, Biofisica, Computer Science, Didattica della Fisica, Geofisica, Fisica nucleare, Fisica della materia, Fisica Teorica, Metodologie Fisiche Applicate. Il DSF opera in sinergia con diverse istituzioni di ricerca nazionali: Istituto Nazionale di Fisica Nucleare, Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche, Consorzio Interuniversitario per le Scienze Fisiche della Materia, Istituto Nazionale di Geofisica e Vulcanologia. Alcune attività sono sviluppate con i Centri di Competenza Regionali AMRA e Tecnologie. L’attività di ricerca è inoltre svolta nell’ambito di numerose collaborazioni internazionali.

MCM Techno Consulting

Ing. Luca Aiello

Ing. Luca De Rosa

La MCM Techno è una società di consulenza che fornisce servizi integrati di ingegneria, management e

finanza nel settore della ricerca industriale. Nata nel 2000 con la convinzione che l’innovazione costante

dei prodotti e dei processi industriali fosse un fattore di massima criticità per la competitività delle

aziende italiane. La MCM Techno si è specializzata nello sviluppo di nuovi prodotti in collaborazione con imprese industriali e nell'attivazione e gestione di agevolazioni finanziarie pubbliche e private per investimenti in sviluppo di nuovi prodotti e tecnologie per l’industria ed i servizi tecnologici. MCM Techno opera in diversi settori produttivi, quali l’industria Chimica delle Formulazioni, l’industria della Trasformazione dei Materiali Plastici e Lapidei, le Biotecnologie, le Tecnologie Informatiche e della Telecomunicazioni, le Produzioni di Mezzi di Trasporto e nel Sistema Agroalimentare.

Versione Inglese/a seguire/Versione ItalianaWHAT IS NABALL ?
IT IS THE FIRST AND
ONLY MOUSE CONCEIVED AND DESIGNED TO ENABLEPEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES to
interact with every video systems. It is the result of the joint effort
of professors and researchers in industrial design, physics, materials
engineering and a student of design, suffering from physical disabilities,  who worked on the audit of the mouse.
[People with disabilities interact
with the environment around theirself through a series of actions carried out
in ways not always understood or effective. Its task is to make this
interaction easier and more effective, if necessary, through an activity of
translation of expression or functional codes. In the current cultural and
technological evolution there is an increasing interest in assistive
technology. Rather than help, we can talk about aid system, in other words a
set of hardware and software interacting with the user and the environment
around.]
NABALL ISMUCH MORE THAN A SIMPLE MOUSE, DUE TO FLEXIBILITY AND ADAPTABILITY, is able to interact with all video
systems, integrating IN A SINGLE SYSTEM the functions of all the devices on the market
and in use.
This REVOLUTIONARY MOUSE can be used both by people unable to perform
normally standard movements, both by people with different levels of physical
disabilities in the upper limbs, and finally, by people without upper limbs
using the accessory bracelet.
WHY DO WE NEED FUNDING?
The raising need to COMUNICATE, INFORM AND ENTERTAIN are making more and more important the role of interaction by media in the contemporary society. EVERYONE HAS THE RIGHT TO ASK, RECEIVE AND GIVE INFORMATION AND
COMMUNICATE IDEAS THROUGH ANY MEDIA AND WITHOUT LIMITS OR BORDERS.The fundraising campaign will be used to finance the
activities of study, research and development of systems, products and services
able TO ENABLE AND CONNECTEVERYONE TO THE CULTURE OF INFORMATION, ENTERTAINMENT AND MEDIA
ASSISTANCE, ranging from able-bodied to the elderly people, from
kids to people with temporary and permanent disabilities or without limbs.
The fundraiser will be used to
transform into reality needs and desires of people. Having
numerous grants it will be possible to build and develop the first working
prototype of the mouse Naball. To
achieve this first goal
$32,000 are needed. By supporting this project in every possible way,
disseminating information between contacts friends and relatives will be possible
to speed up the construction and implementation of the new mouse for everything and everyone.
BECOME A BUILDER OF DREAMS ........!!!WHAT ABOUT THE ADVANTAGES OF NABALL?With Naball, designed with the
intent to simplify the access and interaction with computer systems to all
users, people without disabilities, the elderly, children and people with
temporary and permanent disabilities, it will be possible to:
ALLOW people with disabilities and
without upper limb - hand - to interact completely with all video systems and
software on the market;
PREVENT the onset of diseases derived from the
continuing use of the mouse;
MINIMIZE the effort and the necessary
movements to work on the computer, change channels on TV and play;
SIMPLIFY the procedures for interaction with
all multimedia systems to communicate, work and entertain;
SPEED UP the
interaction with all multimedia systems;
USE in a
customized way, in the space and on any type of surface systems of interaction;
SIMPLIFY the
interaction with game consoles to children under the age of 10 years;
ENABLE elderly
people to use video systems while minimizing operations.WHICH MEETS THE NEEDS NABALL MOUSE?
Needs to communicate, work, learn, entertain
through computers and multimedia tools highlights the growing need for a faster,
immediate and easy interaction. Input devices with input video systems such as
mouse, joystick or remote controls currently on the market detect a series of
constraints that limit the user's actions and therefore do not provide a simple,
fast and effective interaction. The continuous use of the mouse may also, for
the obliged position to use on a surface, can cause the onset of DISEASES SUCH AS TENDONITIS HAND OR CARPAL TUNNEL SYNDROME THE EFFECTS of which incur musculoskeletal
disorders. Moreover, must be emphasized that THE CURRENT FORMAL AND
FUNCTIONAL FEATURES OF DEVICES MAKE
DIFFICULT THE USE OF VIDEO SYSTEMS AND COMPUTERS TO PEOPLE WITH MOTOR TEMPORARY
AND PERMANENT DISABILITIES.In this conditions, in fact, the need to
interact with the multimedia tools is amplified but current systems sometimes make
impossible to use completely computers or software, partially fulfilling some
functions. Scanner emulators or ocular pointing devices, for example, are slow
and imprecise and need to be combined with a mouse to allow all the functions
required. Often people with disabilities are not able to coordinate the
movements in a way sufficient to operate these buttons.WHAT ABOUT THE FEATURES OF NABALL?AUTOMATIC FUNCTIONWith the mouse Naball you can connect with ease, disconnect and reconnect to the computer without performing any additional steps, there is not a conventional position or an association between its direction and screen.  FIRST AND UNIQUE TOUCH SURFACE CURVEThe mouse Naball
is covered with a touch-sensitive, capacitive type surface connected to the
electronic core. For this reason you can enter input through slight touches of
its surface, without applying a pressure on it. As a result it simplifies the joint
movements. Due to the uniformity and homogeneity of the external surface is
also possible to enter an input in any point of the external surface of the spherical
shape device.FLEXIBILITY IN USEYou can hold and use the mouse Naball regardless of the vertical or
horizontal position of the screen. 
It can be used both by people unable to perform
normally standard movements, both by people with different levels of physical
disabilities in the upper limbs, and finally, by people without upper limbs
(specifically the hands).
Therefore, it can be used in the following
ways:
- Holding the device into the palm of your hand
and moving it, rotating and translating it into the space;
- Putting the device on any surface and moving
the ball, rotating and translating it, on a plan;
- Using the device on the charging base and
rotating it;
- Anchoring the device to the shape memory cuff,
putting it on a surface and moving, rotating and translating it, on the plan.

THE MAGIC OF TOUCHES WITH THE FIRST SPHERICAL TOUCH MOUSE NABALLRAPID ROTATIONAL
ACCELERATIONThis command allows you to enter an input
through the fast-moving acceleration towards right or to the left.
CLICKThis command allows the user to enter an input
through a single click on any point of the external surface of the sphere,
without any conventional button or holding the mouse into the palm of your hand
and rotating it in space, holding the mouse on the worktable or any surface, or
anchoring it to the mouse accessory cuff.DOUBLE CLICK
This command allows the user to open the file
by double clicking on any point on the external surface of the sphere, without
any conventional button,  holding the
mouse into the palm of your hand and rotating it in space,  holding the mouse on the worktable or any
surface, or anchoring the mouse to the accessory cuff.SCROLL 
This command allows the user to scroll the
window on the desktop PC and / or on the TV screen through the linear touch on
any point of the external surface of the mouse.CHARGING THE MOUSETo recharge, as well as to use it, the device
can be put on the base in any position. The charging takes place by induction,
and therefore does not require any electrical connector between base and
device.
For these reasons the mouse Naball:
- Does not require a predetermined position,
neither for the charging or use of the device into the charging cradle.
- There are no electrical connections between
the mouse and the base that can interrupt the continuity and uniformity of the
surface, in this way is avoided any risk situation due to spilled liquids on
the device and on the base.SHAPE MEMORY ACCESSORY CUFF, ADAPTABLE AND FLEXIBLEThe mouse has a shape memory accessory bracelet
equipped with an interactive display and an anchoring system.
Due to its shape-memory material, the structure
of the bracelet is adaptable to any type of limb, even to people without hands
or suffering from total or partial paralysis of the hands.
After you put the mouse in the anchoring
system, is possible to put the cuff at the wrist/forearm of the user without
hands just through a helical winding programmed for different needs. It enables
users to make offsets and rotation of the ball on a plan and interact with the
computer without the use of hands.
The cuff has an interactive display to interact
with the mouse and with the computer through the touch of the surface or
entering voice commands. THANKS FOR YOUR ATTENTIONvideo made by designer Elvira Passerobrand made by phd arch. Giuseppe VaccaroTEAM WORKING GROUPDICDEA
DEPARTMENT_SECOND UNIVERSITY OF NAPLESProf. arch. Mario Buono phd arch. Sonia Capecedesigner Pasquale SalzilloThe team of the

MCM Techno

Italian companies.

operates in various sectors, such as industry Chemistry formulations, the
industry's Transformation of Plastics and Lapidei, Biotechnology, Information
Technologies and Telecommunications, Productions of Means of Transport and in
the Food System.COS’È IL MOUSE NABALL?
È il primo e unico mouse pensato per TUTTO e per TUTTI
Brevetto di Invenzione Industriale numero_
NA2011A000031 
Estensione PCT numero_PCT/IT2012/000217
NABALL È IL PRIMO E UNICO MOUSE PENSATO E PROGETTATO
PER CONSENTIRE AI DIVERSAMENTE ABILI di
interagire con tutti i sistemi video. È il risultato di un lavoro
congiunto di docenti e ricercatori dell’area del disegno industriale, docenti e
ricercatori di fisica e ricercatori in ingegneria dei materiali e un allievo
designer, affetto da disabilità motoria, che ha collaborato alla verifica del
mouse.
[La persona con disabilità si rapporta con l’ambiente
circostante mediante una serie di azioni svolte attraverso modalità non sempre
comprensibili o efficaci. Il compito dell’ausilio è quello di facilitare questo
rapporto e l’efficacia delle azioni, se necessario, attraverso una vera e
propria opera di traduzione di codici espressivi o funzionali. Nell’attuale
situazione di evoluzione tecnologica e culturale, si registra un fortissimo
incremento dell’interesse verso gli ausili tecnologici. Più che di ausilio si
può parlare di sistema di ausilio, da intendere come un complesso insieme di
hardware e software che interagiscono con la persona e l’ambiente circostante.]
NABALL È MOLTO PIÙ DI UN SEMPLICE MOUSE,
GRAZIE ALLA MASSIMA FLESSIBILITÀ E ADATTABILITÀ, è in
grado di
interagire con tutti i sistemi video, integrando in un sistema unico le funzioni di tutte le periferiche in
commercio e in utilizzo. Il rivoluzionario mouse può
essere utilizzato sia da persone in grado di svolgere normalmente i movimenti
standard, sia da persone con diversi livelli di disabilità motoria agli arti
superiori fino a persone prive di arti superiori con l’accessorio a bracciale.PERCHE' ABBIAMO BISOGNO DI FONDI ? 
Il crescente bisogno di COMUNICARE, INFORMARSI, e INTRATTENERSI rendono sempre più rilevante e
nevralgico il ruolo della interazione mediatica nella società contemporanea. CIASCUNO HA IL DIRITTO DI CHIEDERE, RICEVERE E COMUNICARE INFORMAZIONI E
IDEE ATTRAVERSO QUALSIASI MEZZO E SENZA LIMITI NÉ FRONTIERE.
La campagna raccolta fondi servirà per finanziare l’attività
di studio, ricerca e sviluppo di sistemi, prodotti e servizi in grado di
ABILITARE E CONNETTERE TUTTI VERSO LA CULTURA DELL’INFORMAZIONE,
DELL’INTRATTENIMENTO E DELL’ASSISTENZA MEDIATICA, dalle
persone normodotate agli anziani; dai bambini alle persone con disabilità
motorie temporanee e permanenti fino a persone privi di arti. 
La raccolta fondi servirà per trasformare in realtà i bisogni e i desideri delle persone, grazie ai numerosi
contributi sarà possibile COSTRUIRE E SVILUPPARE IL PRIMO MODELLO FUNZIONANTE DEL MOUSE
NABALL. Per ottenere
questo primo traguardo sono
necessari $ 32,000. Sostenendo questo progetto in tutti i modi possibili,
diffondendo le informazioni tra i contatti, amici e parenti, sarà possibile
accellerare la costruzione e realizzazione del NUOVO MOUSE PER TUTTO E PER TUTTI. 
DIVENTA ANCHE TU UN COSTRUTTORE DI SOGNI……..!!!
QUALI SONO I VANTAGGI DEL MOUSE NABALL? 
GRAZIE AL MOUSE NABALL, progettato
con l’intento di semplificare l’accesso e l’interazione con i sistemi
informatici a tutte le utenze, persone normodotate, anziani, bambini e persone
affette da disabilità motorie temporanee e permanenti, SARÀ POSSIBILE:
PERMETTERE alle
persone con disabilità motorie e prive di arti superiori – mano – di interagire
con tutti i sistemi multimediali e software in commercio in maniera completa;
EVITARE l’insorgere di dolori e
infiammazioni;
RIDURRE al minimo lo
sforzo e i movimenti necessari per lavorare al pc, cambiare i canali in tv e
giocare; 
SEMPLIFICARE le modalità
d’interazione con tutti i sistemi multimediali per comunicare, lavorare e
intrattenersi; 
VELOCIZZARE l’interazione con
tutti i sistemi multimediali;
UTILIZZARE in maniera
personalizzata, nello spazio e su qualsiasi tipologia di superficie i sistemi
d’interazione;
PERMETTERE alle persone
anziane di utilizzare i sistemi multimediali riducendo al minimo le operazioni;
FACILITARE l’interazione con le console game ai bambini con
un’età inferiore ai 10 anni.QUALI ESIGENZE SODDISFA IL MOUSE NABALL? 
Esigenze quali
comunicare, lavorare, informarsi, intrattenersi attraverso i computer e gli
strumenti multimediali evidenziano il crescente bisogno di un’interazione
veloce, immediata e facile. I dispositivi di immissione input con i sistemi
video quali mouse, joystick o telecomandi attualmente in commercio rilevano una
serie di vincoli che limitano le azioni dell’utente e di conseguenza non
soddisfano i bisogni di un’interazione semplice, veloce ed efficace. L’utilizzo
continuativo dei mouse inoltre, per la costrizione della posizione d’impiego su
una superficie, provoca l’insorgere di PATOLOGIE QUALI TENDINITE ALLA MANO O LA SINDROME DEL TUNNEL CARPALE  i cui effetti
incorrono in disturbi muscolo‐scheletrici. Bisogna evidenziare inoltre che LE CARATTERISTICHE FORMALI E FUNZIONALI DEI MOUSE IN
USO LIMITANO L’UTILIZZO DEI SISTEMI VIDEO E DEL
COMPUTER DA PARTE DI PERSONE AFFETTE DA DISABILITÀ
MOTORIE TEMPORANEE E PERMANENTI..
Nel caso specifico, difatti, l’esigenza di interagire con gli strumenti
multimediali si amplifica e i sistemi d’ausilio in uso rendono talvolta
impossibile un utilizzo completo dei computer e di tutti i software in
commercio poiché soddisfano parzialmente alcune funzioni; gli emulatori a
scansione o i dispositivi a puntamento oculare, ad esempio, oltre ad essere
lenti e imprecisi, devono necessariamente essere abbinati con i mouse per
consentire la complessità di tutte le funzioni richieste e spesso accade che le
persone con disabilità non siano in grado di coordinare i movimenti in modo
sufficiente per azionare tali pulsanti. QUALI SONO LE FUNZIONI DEL MOUSE NABALL? 
AUTOINSTALLAZIONE
il mouse Naball
consente di avviare e/o riavviare le comunicazioni tra il mouse e il computer
automaticamente, senza alcuna procedura di installazione, senza alcun
posizionamento convenzionale e indipendentemente dall’orientazione assunta
rispetto allo schermo.






PRIMA E UNICA SUPERFICIE TOUCH CURVAil mouse Naball è
rivestito da una superficie sensibile al tocco del tipo capacitivo collegata al
nucleo elettronico. Questo consente l’immissione dei comandi di input sulla
superficie attraverso lievi sfioramenti senza la necessita di applicare una
forza di pressione, agevolando e semplificando, in tal senso, i movimenti
articolari. Grazie all’uniformità e omogeneità della superficie esterna è
possibile, inoltre, immettere input su qualsiasi punto della superficie esterna
del dispositivo di puntamento di forma sferica.
FLESSIBILITA' DI UTILIZZO
è possibile impugnare e
utilizzare il mouse Naball indipendentemente dalla disposizione verticale
oppure orizzontale dello schermo. Questo consente di utilizzare il nuovo mouse
sia da persone in grado di svolgere normalmente i movimenti standard, sia da
persone con diversi livelli di disabilità motoria agli arti superiori fino a
persone prive di arti superiori (nello specifico le mani).
Pertanto l’uso può
avvenire nelle seguenti modalità:
- tenendo il
dispositivo nel palmo della mano e imprimendo movimenti di rotazione e
traslazione nello spazio;
- poggiando il
dispositivo su di una qualsiasi superficie e imprimendo movimenti di rotazione
traslazione della sfera sul piano;
- utilizzando il dispositivo
sulla base di ricarica e imprimendo movimenti di rotazione;
- ancorando il
dispositivo al bracciale a memoria di forma poggiandolo su qualsiasi superficie
e imprimendo movimenti di rotazione traslazione della sfera sul piano.LA MAGIA DEI TOCCHI CON IL PRIMO MOUSE SFERICO TOUCH NABALL 
RAPIDA ACCELLERAZIONE ROTAZIONALEquesto comando consente di immettere un input attraverso il movimento rapido di accelerazione verso destra o verso sinistraCLIC
questo comando consente
di immettere un input attraverso un singolo clic su qualsiasi punto della
superficie esterna della sfera, senza alcun tasto convenzionale, sia tenendo il
mouse nel palmo della mano e ruotandolo nello spazio, sia tenendo il mouse sul
piano di lavoro o su qualsiasi superficie e sia ancorando il mouse
all’accessorio bracciale.DOPPIO CLIC
questo comando consente
di aprire i file attraverso un doppio clic su qualsiasi punto della superficie
esterna della sfera, senza alcun tasto convenzionale, sia tenendo il mouse nel
palmo della mano e ruotandolo nello spazio, sia tenendo il mouse sul piano di
lavoro o su qualsiasi superficie e sia ancorando il mouse all’accessorio
bracciale.SCROLL
questo comando consente
di scorrere la finestra sul desktop del pc e/o sullo schermo del televisore attraverso
lo sfioramento lineare su qualsiasi punto della superficie esterna del mouse.RICARICA DEL MOUSE
Per la ricarica come
per l’uso, il dispositivo può essere poggiato sulla base in qualunque
posizione. La ricarica avviene per induzione e quindi non richiede alcun
connettore elettrico tra la base ed il dispositivo. 
Pertanto:
- non è richiesto un
posizionamento predeterminato né per la carica né per l’uso del dispositivo
sulla base di ricarica 
- non ci sono
connessioni elettriche connettori elettrici tra il mouse e la base né
connettori sul dispositivo che interrompano la continuità e l’uniformità della
superficie, così pure è evitata qualunque situazione di rischio dovuta a
liquidi versati sul dispositivo e sulla base.
La ricarica si attiva
automaticamente al posizionamento del mouse sulla base e si interrompe
automaticamente a ricarica completata. La ricarica avviene anche durante l’uso,
seppure può richiedere tempi più lunghi sia per il simultaneo uso di energia
sia per le variazioni di posizione rispetto alla posizione ottimale di
ricarica.ACCESSORIO BRACCIALE A MEMORIA DI FORMA 
Il mouse è costituito
da un accessorio a bracciale a memoria di forma corredato da un display
interattivo e un sistema di ancoraggio. 
La struttura del bracciale
consente di adattarsi a qualsiasi tipologia di arto grazie al materiale a
memoria di forma e prevede l’utilizzo da parte di persone prive delle mani o
affette da paralisi totali o parziali delle mani.
Infatti il bracciale,
una volta collocato il mouse nel sistema di ancoraggio, viene fissato al
polso/avambraccio dell’utilizzatore “privo delle mani” mediante un avvolgimento
elicoidale programmato opportunamente rispetto alle diverse esigenze.
Questo consente di
effettuare movimenti di rotazione traslazione della sfera sul piano e di
interagire con il computer senza l’ausilio delle mani.
Il bracciale presenta
un display interattivo che consente di interagire con il mouse e con il
computer attraverso lo sfioramento della superficie touch o l’immissione di
comandi vocali.GRAZIE PER L'ATTENZIONE.....!TEAM DI LAVORO

story:
Hello, ladies and gentlemen, in front of you all stand two simple guys giving their souls into making “Sunken” – a game, hopefully, worthy your time and attention.



An atmospheric, dungeon crawling ARPG with a touch of a Roguelike, “Sunken” is intended to be a marriage of genres with several aspects listed (and explained) below.



1) Permadeath – Since the beginning of the project, we wanted “Sunken” to be hardcore. When you die, you lose your levels and equipment, however, the skills you have unlocked stay that way. It is important for us to tell this to you, the players, early, as we do not want you to be surprised when you lose the items you have crafted or looted or the levels that you gained by progressing through the dungeon. Go big or go home!



2) Crafting – Crafting is an important part of “Sunken”. More than anything, you will be looting crafting materials. Crafting is done exclusively in the ‘crafting room’ found on every level of the dungeon. To be able to craft anything, though, you will need to find recipes for the items or the abilities that you want to craft (yes, the abilities are not gained through leveling, but by crafting!).

3) Randomization – Although the levels aren't randomized (the reason for this will be written below), the monsters and the loot are random. Whether you’ll get a weak sword or a great armor, whether you’ll run into a few zombies or an elite Impaler with Tormentors following in his wake, is left to chance, the chance you will have to take in “Sunken”.



4) Leveling – Soooo, where is the real RPG element in all this, right? By leveling, you gain stats. They are Might, Dexterity, Vitality and Intellect. With each level gained, you have five stat points to distribute as you see fit. Even when you find the best-in-slot gear, the game is not over, you keep leveling and fighting. Just be sure to use the distribution to follow your style, as you cannot get back the points you have invested. As the death is permanent, invest these points well!



5) Atmosphere – Sure, we like games that are simply fun, but the immersion through visuals, sounds and storyline is irreplaceable for us. Thus, “Sunken” will try to be heavy on immersion. This is also the reason why the levels aren't randomized – they look too generic, at least with the very limited assets available to us. This is also one of the reasons (the other one being permadeath) why “Sunken” isn't as fast-paced as some other games of its genre, thus there are no stats like “attack speed” or “movement speed”. Stomping the content as quickly as possible isn't the goal – survival is. “Sunken” is set in an eerie dungeon out of this world and we want that atmosphere to sink into your bones.




6) Narrative – We like story-driven games. Although “Sunken” is an ARPG, we have tailored the narrative to our liking, and we tried not to allow the action to overshadow the story. There are many lore books lying around in each level of the dungeon, and we hope they will be a treat for the people who love having a good story in their games. The narrative is not spoon-fed, and you will have to figure out some things on your own. Of course, for those not interested, skipping any narrative piece is always an option.


7) Competition – You will fight – until you die. Compete with other players by checking the leaderboard. Whoever reaches the farthest ‘spin’ and ‘level’ (hey, we do not have to reveal everything, right?), is leading the boards. Go get them, tigers. You don't want to compete with other players? No worries, completing single player campaign will give you just as much satisfaction. You make the decision.



If you read up to here, we are thankful. If you have seen something you like in Sunken, support us through the pledges listed below. Thanks buys! :)



We are, originally, an artist and a writer, but, we came to be just about anything needed to finish this game. We both worked in the gaming industry before doing this, but, this is the first project of this magnitude for us. The main thing about us is that we hate giving cheesy speeches. So, we just want to be informal and friendly with you guys, and simply have fun while developing “Sunken”, like we have had so far.



Although “Sunken” is not an AAA title, obviously, it is not an easy game to finish. With you, we can do a lot more, to make “Sunken” what we always wanted it to be. Covering all the fields will be a lot easier once we firmly set our feet on the ground and invest in everything that will make this game glow its darkest light. We are currently struggling to acquire funds for voice acting and graphics. With additional funds we will be able to record sound effects in a professional studio, finance new 3d models and improve graphics as a whole. If the project is successful, our plan is to release the game Q1 2016. 

Team “Sunken” consists of only 2 members and, unfortunately, none of us has any experience with audio in game development. Hopefully, we will overcome those obstacles with your help. We plan the use our funds the following way:






We believe in open door policy.  If you've got any questions, we want you to know the answers.  Ask us anything you want (although beware, we wish to keep some secrets about the game... well, secrets) but pretty much everything else is open for discussion.

Ask questions in the comments section. We will give our best to answer quickly. We value your questions, support, and interactions, so we will do everything possible to make you smile. Our E-Mail is sunkenarpg@gmail.com

 <- Contact us on Twitter

         <- Contact us on Facebook


You can vote for us on Steam Greenlight and IndieDB
story_txt:
Hello, ladies and gentlemen, in front of you all stand two simple
guys giving their souls into making “Sunken” – a game, hopefully, worthy your
time and attention.






An atmospheric, dungeon crawling ARPG
with a touch of a Roguelike,
“Sunken” is
intended to be a marriage of genres with several aspects listed (and explained)
below.



1) Permadeath – Since the beginning of the project, we wanted
“Sunken” to be hardcore. When you die, you lose your levels and equipment,
however, the skills you have unlocked stay that way. It is important for us to
tell this to you, the players, early, as we do not want you to be surprised
when you lose the items you have crafted or looted or the levels that you
gained by progressing through the dungeon. Go big or go home!





2) Crafting
– Crafting is an important part of “Sunken”. More than anything, you will be
looting crafting materials. Crafting is done exclusively in the ‘crafting room’
found on every level of the dungeon. To be able to craft anything,
though, you will need to find recipes for the items or the abilities that you want to
craft (yes, the abilities are not gained through leveling, but by crafting!).

3) Randomization – Although the levels aren't randomized (the
reason for this will be written below), the monsters and the loot are random. Whether
you’ll get a weak sword or a great armor, whether you’ll run into a few zombies
or an elite Impaler with Tormentors following in his wake, is left to chance, the chance you
will have to take in “Sunken”.





4) Leveling – Soooo, where is the real RPG element in all
this, right? By leveling, you gain stats. They are Might, Dexterity, Vitality
and Intellect. With each level gained, you have five stat points to distribute
as you see fit. Even when you find the
best-in-slot gear, the game is not over, you keep leveling and fighting. Just
be sure to use the distribution to follow your style, as you cannot get back
the points you have invested. As the death is permanent, invest these points
well!




5) Atmosphere
– Sure, we like games that are simply
fun, but the immersion through visuals, sounds and storyline is irreplaceable for
us. Thus, “Sunken” will try to be heavy on immersion. This is also the reason
why the levels aren't randomized – they look too generic, at least
with the very limited assets available to us. This is also one of the reasons
(the other one being permadeath) why “Sunken” isn't as fast-paced as some other
games of its genre, thus there are no stats like “attack speed” or “movement
speed”. Stomping the content as quickly as possible isn't the goal – survival is. “Sunken” is set in an eerie dungeon out of this world and we want that atmosphere to sink into your bones.





6) Narrative
– We like story-driven games. Although “Sunken” is an ARPG, we have tailored
the narrative to our liking, and we tried not to allow the action to overshadow
the story. There are many lore books lying around in each level of the dungeon,
and we hope they will be a treat for the people who love having a good story in
their games. The narrative is not spoon-fed, and you will have to figure out
some things on your own. Of course, for those not interested, skipping any
narrative piece is always an option.


7) Competition – You will fight –
until you die. Compete with other players by checking the leaderboard.
Whoever reaches the farthest ‘spin’ and ‘level’ (hey, we do not have to reveal
everything, right?), is leading the boards. Go get them, tigers. You don't want to compete with other players? No worries, completing single player campaign will give you just as much satisfaction. You make the decision.




If you read up to here, we are thankful. If you have seen something you like in Sunken, support us through the pledges listed below. Thanks buys! :)







We are, originally, an artist and a writer, but, we came to be just about anything
needed to finish this game. We both worked in the gaming industry before doing
this, but, this is the first project of this magnitude for us. The main thing about us is that
we hate giving cheesy speeches. So, we just want to be informal and friendly with you guys, and simply have fun while developing “Sunken”, like we have had so far.





Although “Sunken” is not an AAA title, obviously, it is not an easy game to finish. With you, we can do a lot more, to make “Sunken” what we always wanted it to be. Covering all the fields will be a lot easier once we firmly set our feet on the ground and invest in everything that will make this game glow its darkest light. We are currently struggling to acquire funds for voice acting and graphics. With additional funds we will be able to record sound effects in a professional studio, finance new 3d models and improve graphics as a whole. If the project is successful, our plan is to release the game Q1 2016. 
Team “Sunken” consists of only 2 members and, unfortunately, none of us has any experience with audio in game development. Hopefully, we will overcome those obstacles with your help. We plan the use our funds the following way:










We believe in open door policy.  If you've got any questions, we want you to know the answers.  Ask us anything you want (although beware, we wish to keep some secrets about the game... well, secrets) but pretty much everything else is open for discussion.
Ask questions in the comments section. We will give our best to answer quickly. We value your questions, support, and interactions, so we will do
everything possible to make you smile. Our E-Mail is sunkenarpg@gmail.com

         <- Contact us on Facebook

You can vote for us on Steam Greenlight and IndieDB

story:
Short Summary

My name is Angelos Kyprianos. I am a full time musician and songwriter. The only thing that has managed to distract me from my music, is my love for pen & paper role-playing games. I have been working on this game since i was 11 years old. 20 years later, i am about to set it free! It has been a long journey of endless work, fun and creativity. People who have grown up with these types of games, know how i feel, for others, i would recommend that you make some time and room for this in your life, it's going to blow your mind.

What We Need & What You Get

So here is the deal: WE NEED:

  • Such a game to be developed requires a lot. Artwork mainly, and lots of it, and good. We need the funds to cover the expenses of the amazing illustrator we are working with.
  • Printing of the books and production. Digital is fine, but printed books are always the best option for these types of games.
  • Miniatures and combat grid. It's a long shot, but maybe, we can pull off 3d printing of unique miniatures, dice, and terrains, basic stuff to start off a campaign!
  • Songs! Yes, a singer-songwriter can be turned into a bard if needed! I am trying to record a few game related bard style songs to give along with the game, contributing to the fantasy vibes.
  • IN RETURN YOU GET:
  • A lot of perks, assigned below, of course, game related.

The Impact

Why this game specifically?

  • The detailed character generation system and combat gameplay is both detailed and fun. It includes all these small features we always wanted our pen & paper game to have. It allows strategy, different combat maneuvers, spells and skills. Choice of weapons does matter, their range, their damage, the way they are used can change everything!
  • The stories. So much lore. So many years of creation and campaigning. This is not a bubblegum pre-made game of basic origin stories. It has been created through endless campaigns, inspired stories, hours & hours of gaming and writing. They have depth, and characters with depth, and they blend in a great campaign setting of a fascinating world.

Risks & Challenges

There are so many difficulties to overcome. The creation of the artwork fo the whole project. We are talking weapons, creatures, races, maps, symbols, armors etc. We are talking about endless hours of beta testing, changes, tweaks and all sorts of trouble down the road.

  • There is no going back, It took me 20 years to make this game, it's coming out no matter what!
  • We'll proceed to finalizing this game regarding all areas for every month that passes through intense work and creative thought. All issues are being addressed and solved one way or another. The whole project is almost complete, to a stage that builds hype and excitement because we can actually see the end of this road!

Other Ways You Can Help

You know it folks, share share share, and talk, and explain, and ask!

  • We Fantasy Gamers and generally gamers are in love with this stuff. We are commited and we know the good it has done to our lives, growing up with games like these.
  • Please take a moment and tell a friend if you can't help financially. Or help by beta testing, or help with the creation of promo tools, videos, audio, anything that comes to mind. 

Thank you, thank you thank you, it's been so wonderful!

story:
About Us:

Will: My trail name is "Dad." I have hiked 350 miles on the AT during the Spring of 2014, but had to leave the trail because of injury. After leaving the trail, I acted as a shuttler for hikers around the Port Clinton/Hamburg, PA area. Prior to hiking the trail, I was involved in the BSA for 13 years, as a scout, scout leader, and camp counselor.

Dale: Her camp nickname is "Alpha." For the past few years, Alpha has been a counselor at a Girl Scout camp that actually sits right next to the trail in PA. She's a long-time lover of the outdoors and nature. Her hope is that she will be able to experience the various cultures that meet along the trail. She is also a big fan of pandas.

Both of us are looking forward to putting our outdoor skills to the ultimate test on this amazing adventure.

We are looking to hike the Appalachian Trail between May and August 2015. We will be saving money ourselves from our various jobs, but any help would be appreciated! As recent college grads, it is difficult to put money away with things like student loans, rent, and general cost of living expenses.

This campaign is focused on covering the cost of our rent and bills while we are away for the months it will take us to hike the trail, as well as helping us pay for food and other trail necessities.

We will also be keeping a log of our journey (both before and during) on a blog that will be created and updated regularly by both of us, so keep updated on our progress!

story:
Pincha aquí para Español!

Who are we? 

Hello everybody! Raskyware is a small and young company located in Spain, to create entertaining and original games!


WHAT ARE WE DOING?

We are creating a 2d platform game with Angul Rasky, a funny and interactive wormhog of water and fire. There will be lots of elements waiting to be discovered, especially water and fire, that will be the key on more than one occasion ...

The goal is simple, capture the keys that allow you to move to the next level, located on each stage. The way to reach them will be the real challenge that will test you !!!

Angul Rasky lives in a timeless fantasy, where the player visits a good variety of platforms (mobile, sharp, fragile, unstable, slippery ...), and he will encounter funny and sometimes annoying enemies along the way.

Each world, with 10 complete stages, will feature a bonus and a boss that must be defeated to enter in the next world.


HOW FAR WE WANT TO ARRIVE?

Angul Rasky is already in development, but still "under chrysalis mode" about where we are going. "Finished" the first world (we are always trying to improve), we have three more worlds to complete!!!; The Desert, the Ocean, and the Mechanical world... Cactus jelly, Dragons death, Cat mummies, Dung beetles and many more creatures need your help !!! 

Angul Rasky will be available for PC, Android, Mac and IOS. We plan for this second world (The Desert)...  another 10 stages with 7 enemies 10 interactive and 5 new platforms !!!

PROGRESS OF THE CHARACTER

The save system is automatic, once the stage is completed. The number of lives you have obtained will increase your life!!


GRAPHICS

Angul Rasky animations are made by hand with traditional animation, and then colored it in pixel art style!!


WHAT CAN I DO TO HELP?

Our greatest desire is to develop this game. Only 3 people in a game of this magnitude is a slow, thorough and complete dedication process. With your help we can devote ourselves entirely to Angul Rasky, and finally we will make this game a complete reality !!!


Secret Perk!!!: Discover it!!!

Español 
 ¿QUIENES SOMOS? 
 Hola a todos! Raskyware es una pequeña y joven empresa ubicada en España, para crear juegos entretenidos y originales! 

 ¿QUÉ ESTAMOS HACIENDO? 
Estamos creando un juego de plataformas 2d con Angul Rasky, un divertido e interactivo gusarizo de agua y fuego. Habrá montones de elementos esperando ser descubiertos, especialmente agua y fuego, que serán la clave en más de una ocasión… El objetivo es sencillo, capturar las llaves que te permiten pasar al siguiente nivel, en cada pantalla. El modo de alcanzarlas será el auténtico desafío que te pondrá a prueba !!! Angul Rasky vive en una fantasía atemporal, donde el jugador visita un buen elenco de plataformas (móviles, pinchosas, frágiles, inestables, resbaladizas …) y se encontrará con divertidos y en ocasiones molestos enemigos a lo largo del camino. Cada mundo, compuesto por 10 pantallas completas, contará con un bonus y un jefe final que tendremos que derrotar para acceder al siguiente mundo. 

 ¿HASTA DONDE QUEREMOS LLEGAR? 
Angul Rasky ya está en desarollo, pero todavia en “fase de crisálida” respecto hasta donde queremos llegar. “Acabado” el primer mundo (nosotros siempre tratamos de mejorar), tenemos por delante otros tres más a completar!!!. El Desierto, El Océano, y el mundo Mecánico… Cactus de gelatina, Dragones de la muerte, Momias gatunas, Escarabajos peloteros y muchas más criaturas te necesitan !!! Angul Rasky estará disponible para PC, Android, Mac e IOS. Planeamos para este segundo mundo (El Desierto)… otras 10 pantallas con 7 enemigos, 10 interactivos y 5 nuevas plataformas !!! 

 PROGRESO DEL PERSONAJE 
El sistema de guardado es automático, una vez la pantalla se ha completado. El número de vidas que atesores incrementará tu vida total!!

 GRÁFICOS 
Las animaciones de Angul Rasky están hechas a mano, con animación tradicional, y luego coloreadas al estilo pixel art!! 

 ¿QUÉ PUEDO HACER PARA COLABORAR? 
Nuestro mayor deseo es desarrollar este juego. Tan sólo 3 personas en un juego de tal magnitud es un proceso lento, duro y minucioso de complete dedicación. Con tu ayuda, podemos volcarnos enteramente en Angul Rasky, para hacer de este juego una complete realidad !!! 

 Recompensa secreta!!!: Descúbrela!!!
